/study/scriptures/pgp/introduction.title: Isandulelo
text: IGugu leNani eliKhulu yinhlanganisela yemisebenzi yekhethelo ephatha imininingwane ebalulekile yenkolo nemfundiso yeBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina. Lemisebenzi yahunyushwa futhi yavezwa ngumPhrofethi uJoseph Smith, futhi eminingi yakhishwa kumaphephandaba eBandla ezinsukwini zakhe.

Inhlanganisela yokuqala yemisebenzi enesihloko esithi IGugu leNani eliKhulu yenziwa ngo 1851 yiGosa uFranklin D. Richards, ngaleso sikhathi owayeyilungu lomKhandlu wabayiShumi namBili futhi engumongameli weMishini yaseBrithani. Inhloso yayo kwakungukwenza kubelula kakhulu ukutholakala kwezimfundiso ezibalulekile ezazingakandi ngesikhathi sikaJoseph Smith. Ngokwanda kwamalungu eBandla kuwo wonke amazwekazi aseYurophu naseMelika, kwaba nesidingo sokwenza lemisebenzi itholakale. IGugu leNani eliKhulu lathola ukusetshenziswa okukhulu futhi emuva kwalokho laba ngumsebenzi owemukelekile weBandla ngosizo lobuMongameli bokuQala ngomhlangano omkhulu owawuse Salt Lake City ngomhlaka 10 Oktoba 1880.

Sekwenziwe okuningi ukubuyekezwa kokuqukethwe yilomsebenzi ngokwezidingo zeBandla. Izingxenye zencwadi kaMose ezazingekho encwadini eyakhishwa okokuqala zengezwa ngonyaka ka 1878. Ngo1902 izingxenye ezithile zeGugu leNani eliKhulu ezaziphindaphinda umsebenzi owawusu khishiwe kwiMfundiso neziVumelwano zashiywa. Ukuhlelwa kwalomsebenzi ukuba ube yizahluko namavesi, nezengezo, kwenziwa ngonyaka ka 1902. Ukukhishwa kokuqala okwakuyizinhla ezimbili zamakhasi, nohla lwamagama nezihloko, kwenziwa ngonyaka ka 1921. Alukho olunye ushintsho olwenziwa kwaze kwaba ngo-Epreli ngonyaka ka 1976, lapho imisebenzi emibili yezambulo yengezwa khona. Ngonyaka ka 1979 lemisebenzi emibili yasuswa kwiGugu leNani eliKhulu futhi yafakwa kwiMfundiso neziVumelwano, lapho esivela khona manje njengezigaba 137 kanye no 138. Kulencwadi ekhishwe manje yeGugu leNani eliKhulu sekwenziwe olunye ushintsho ukuze kube khona ukuvumelana kwamagama nemibhalo yaphambilini.
Lokhu okulandelayo yisandulelo esifushane sokuphakathi:
Okukhethiweyo okuthathwe eNcwadini kaMose. Lena yingxenye yamazwi athathwe encwadini kaGenesise ewukuhunyushwa kweBhayibheli okwenziwa nguJoseph Smith, akuqala ngoJuni 1830.

INcwadi ka-Abrahama. Lokhu wukuhunyushwa okwenziwa ngokuholwa nguMoya oNgcwele kwemibhalo ka Abrahama. Lokhu kuhunyushwa uJoseph Smith wakuqala ngonyaka ka 1835 emva kokuthola okusaphepha elalinemibhalo lakudala laseGibithe. Lokhu kuhunyushwa kwakhishwa ngokulandelana kwiphephandaba iTimes and Seasons kusuka ngomhlaka 1 Mashi 1842, eNauvoo, e-Illinois.

Joseph Smith—Mathewu. Lena yingxenye ethathwe ebufakazini bukaMathewu ekuhunyushweni kweBhayibheli okenziwa nguJoseph Smith (bheka iMfundiso neziVumelwano 45:60–61 ngokuphathelene nomyalezo kaNkulunkulu wokuba kuqalwe ukuhunyushwa kweTestamente eliSha).

Joseph Smith—uMlando. Lana ngamazwi athathwe ebufakazini nasemlandweni ogunyaziwe kaJoseph Smith, akulungisa nomabhalane bakhe ngonyaka ka 1838 kuya koka 1839 futhi nokwakhishwa ngokulandelana kwiphephandaba iTimes and Seasons eNauvoo, e-Illinois, kusuka ngomhlaka 15 Mashi, 1842.

ImiBhalo yoKholo yeBandla likaJesu Kristu labaNgcwele beziNsuku zokuGcina. Lokhu kwabhalwa nguJoseph Smith kwakhishwa kwiphephandaba iTimes and Seasons ngomhlaka 1 Mashi 1842, kuphelezelwa wumlando omfushane weBandla futhi nokwa kwaziwa njengeNcwadi ayibhalela uWentworth.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/1.title: Mose 1
chapter_summary: UNkulunkulu uzembula kuMose—UMose uyaguqulwa—Unqwamana noSathane—UMose ubona imihlaba eminingi enabantu kuyo—Imihlaba enganakubaleka yadalwa yiNdodana—Umsebenzi nenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu kuwukufeza ukungafi nokuphila okuphakade komuntu.
subtitle: (Juni 1830)

verses.text: Amazwi kaNkulunkulu, awakhuluma ku Mose langa limbe ngesikhathi uMose ehlwithwa eya entabeni ephakeme kakhulu,
Futhi wabona uNkulunkulu ubuso nobuso, futhi wakhuluma naye, futhi inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu yaba kuMose; ngakho-ke uMose wakwazi ukumelana nenkazimulo yakhe.

Futhi uNkulunkulu wakhuluma kuMose, ethi: Bheka, ngiyiNkosi uNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke, futhi igama lami ngu-Ongenasiphelo; ngokuba anginasiqalo sezinsuku noma isiphelo seminyaka; ngabe akukona yini lokhu ukungabi nasiphelo na?
Futhi, bheka, uyindodana yami; ngalokho-ke buka, futhi ngizokutshengisa umsebenzi wezandla zami; kodwa hhayi wonke, ngokuba imisebenzi yami ayinasiphelo, ngokunjalo namazwi ami, ngokuba awaphezi.

Ngalokho-ke, akukho muntu ongabona yonke imisebenzi yami, ngaphandle kokuba abone yonke inkazimulo yami; futhi akukho muntu ongabona yonke inkazimulo yami, futhi emva kwalokho ahlale esenyameni emhlabeni.

Futhi nginomsebenzi engizokunika wona, Mose, ndodana yami; futhi wena ufana no Zelwe Yedwa wami; futhi oZelwe Yedwa wami unguye futhi uyoba ngu mSindisi, ngokuba ugcwele umusa ne qiniso; kodwa akukho Nkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami, futhi zonke izinto ziphambi kwami, ngokuba ngizazi zonke.
Manje, bheka, lento eyodwa ngikutshengisa yona, Mose, ndodana yami, ngokuba usemhlabeni, manje ngikutshengisa yona.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMose wabuka, futhi wabona umhlaba adalelwa kuwo; futhi uMose wabona umhlaba nesiphelo sawo, nabo bonke abantwana babantu abakhona, futhi nababedaliwe; ngalokho wamangala kakhulu futhi wababaza.
Futhi inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu yasuka kuMose, kangangoba inkazimulo yakhe yayingasekho kuMose; futhi uMose wasala yedwa. Futhi ngesikhathi esesele yedwa, wawela phansi.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi kwaba yisikhathi samahora amaningi ngaphambi kokuba uMose athole futhi amandla akhe emvelo njengawomuntu; futhi wathi kuye: Manje, ngenxa yalokhu sengiyazi ukuthi umuntu akalutho, okuyinto ebengingakaze ngiyicabange.

Kodwa manje amehlo ami abone uNkulunkulu; kodwa hhayi emvelo, kodwa amehlo ami omoya, ngokuba amehlo ami emvelo abengeke akwazi ukubona; ngokuba bekufanele ngibune futhi ngife enkazimulweni yakhe; kodwa inkazimulo yakhe ibiphezu kwami; futhi ngabona ubuso bakhe, ngokuba ngiguquliwe phambi kwakhe.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi ngesikhathi uMose esewashilo lamazwi, bheka, uSathane weza ezo mlinga, ethi: Mose, ndodana yomuntu, ngikhonze.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMose wabheka kuSathane wathi: Ungubani wena na? Ngokuba bheka, ngiyi ndodana kaNkulunkulu, efana noZelwe Yedwa wakhe; futhi iphi inkazimulo yakho, ukuze ngikhonze wena na?

Ngokuba bheka, ngangingeke ngibheke kuNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kokuba inkazimulo yakhe ibe kimi, futhi nginga guqulwanga phambi kwakhe. Kodwa ngingakubheka wena ngamehlo ami emvelo. Akunjalo, ngempela na?

Malibusiswe igama likaNkulunkulu wami, ngokuba uMoya wakhe awusukanga wonke kimi, kungenjalo ikuphi inkazimulo yakho na, ngokuba kuwubumnyama kimi? Futhi ngingahlukanisa phakathi kwakho noNkulunkulu; ngokuba uNkulunkulu uthe kimi: Khonza uNkulunkulu, ngokuba uyena yedwa oyo msebenzela.
Suka lapha, Sathane; ungangikhohlisi; ngokuba uNkulunkulu uthe kimi: Ufana noZelwe Yedwa wami.
Futhi wabuye wanginika imiyalelo ngesikhathi engibizela esihlahleni esivuthayo, ethi: Biza uNkulunkulu egameni loZelwe Yedwa wami, futhi ungikhonze.

Futhi phezu kwalokho uMose wathi: Ngeke ngiyeke ukubiza uNkulunkulu, nginezinye izinto engifuna ukuzibuza kuye: ngokuba inkazimulo yakhe ibiphezu kwami, ngalokho-ke ngingahlukanisa phakathi kwakhe nawe. Suka lapha, Sathane.
Manje, ngesikhathi uMose esesho lamazwi, uSathane wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, futhi waklabalasa emhlabeni, futhi wayala, ethi: Ngingo Zelwe Yedwa, ngikhonze.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMose waqala ukwesaba kakhulu; futhi ngesikhathi eseqala ukwesaba, wabona ububi besi hogo. Nokho, ebiza uNkulunkulu, wafumana amandla, futhi wayala, ethi: Suka kimi, Sathane, ngokuba yiloNkulunkulu yedwa engizomkhonza, okunguNkulunkulu wenkazimulo.
Manje uSathane waqala ukuqhaqhazela, nomhlaba wazamazama; noMose wathola amandla, futhi wabiza uNkulunkulu, ethi: Egameni loZelwe Yedwa, suka lapha, Sathane.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uSathane wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, ngokukhala, nokulila, noku gedla kwamazinyo; futhi wasuka lapho, ngisho naphambi kukaMose, kangangoba akabange esambona.
Manje uMose wafakaza ngalokhu; kodwa ngenxa yobubi akwaziwa phakathi kwabantwana babantu.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi ngesikhathi uSathane esesukile phambi kukaMose, ukuthi uMose waphakamisela amehlo akhe ezulwini, egcwaliswe ngo Moya oNgcwele, ofakaza ngoBaba neNdodana;

Futhi ebiza igama likaNkulunkulu, waphinde wabona inkazimulo yakhe, ngokuba yayisiphezu kwakhe; futhi wezwa izwi, lithi: Ubusisiwe, Mose, ngokuba mina, uMninimandla Onke, ngikukhethile, futhi uyokwenziwa ube namandla kuna manzi amaningi; ngokuba ayowuhlonipha umyalelo wakho kube sengathi ungu Nkulunkulu.
Futhi bheka, nginawe, ngisho kuze kube sekuphelene kwezinsuku zakho; ngokuba uyo khulula abantu bami kubo ubugqili, ngisho u-Israyeli okhethiweyo wami.
Futhi kwenzeka, ngesikhathi izwi lisakhuluma, uMose waphonsa amehlo akhe futhi wabona umhlaba, yebo, ngisho wonke, futhi kwakungekho nokuncane kwawo angakubonanga, ewubona ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu.

Futhi wabona abantu abahlala kuwo, futhi kwakungekho muntu angambonanga; futhi wayebabona ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu; futhi inani labo lali likhulu, ngisho bengabaleki njengesihlabathi phezu kosebe lolwandle.
Futhi wabona izindawo eziningi; futhi indawo ngayinye yayibizwa ngezwe, futhi kwakukhona abantu ebusweni bezwe ngalinye.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMose wabiza uNkulunkulu, ethi: Ngitshele, ngiyakucela, kungani lezi zinto zinjena, futhi wazenza ngani na?

Futhi bheka, inkazimulo yeNkosi yayiphezu kukaMose, kangangoba uMose wama phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi wakhuluma naye ubuso nobuso. Futhi iNkosi uNkulunkulu yathi kuMose: Ukuze ngifeze inhloso yami ngenze lezi zinto. Nakhu ukuhlakanipha futhi kuhleli kimi.
Futhi ngezwi lamandla ami, ngizidalile, okuyiNdodana yami eZelwe Yodwa, egcwele umusa ne qiniso.
Futhi imihlaba engabaleki ngiyi dalile; futhi nayo ngiyidalele inhloso yami; futhi ngeNdodana ngiyidalile, okungo Zelwe Yedwa wami.
Futhi umuntu wokuqala kubantu bonke ngambiza ngo-Adamu, okungukuthi abaningi.

Kodwa yindaba yalomhlaba kuphela, nabantu bawo, engikunika yona. Ngokuba bheka, miningi imihlaba eseyadlula ngezwi lamandla ami. Futhi miningi esamile namanje, futhi ayibaleki kumuntu; kodwa zonke izinto zibaliwe kimi, ngokuba zingezami futhi ngiyazazi.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMose wakhuluma neNkosi, wathi: Yiba nomusa encekwini yakho, O Nkulunkulu, futhi ungitshele ngokuphathelene nalomhlaba, nabantu bawo, futhi nangamazulu, futhi emva kwalokho inceku yakho izogculiseka.
Futhi iNkosi uNkulunkulu yakhuluma kuMose, yathi: Amazulu, maningi, futhi ngeke abaleka kumuntu; kodwa ayabaleka kimi, ngokuba angawami.
Futhi njengoba umhlaba omunye uyodlula, namazulu awo kanjalo-ke nomunye uyoza; futhi akukho siphetho emisebenzini yami, nasemazwini ami.
Ngokuba bheka, lokhu kungu msebenzi wami ne nkazimulo yami—ukufeza ukungafi no kuphila okuphakade komuntu.
Manje, Mose, ndodana yami, ngizokhuluma kuwe ngokuphathelene nalomhlaba ome phezu kwawo; futhi uzozi bhala izinto engizozikhuluma.

Futhi ngosuku lapho abantwana babantu beyolibuka izwi lami njengeze futhi basuse amaningi encwadini oyoyibhala, bheka, ngiyokhetha omunye ofana nawe; futhi ayophinda abekhona phakathi kwabantwana babantu—phakathi kwabo bonke abayokholwa.
(Lawamazwi akhulunywa kuMose entabeni, igama layo elingeke laziwe phakathi kwabantwana babantu. Manje asekhulunywa kuwe. Ungawatshengisi muntu ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo. Ngisho kanjalo. Amen.)

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/2.title: Mose 2
chapter_summary: UNkulunkulu udala amazulu nomhlaba—Zonke izimo zempilo ziyadalwa—UNkulunkulu wenza umuntu futhi umnika ukubusa phezu kwazo zonke izinto.
subtitle: (Juni–Oktoba ngo1830)

verses.text: Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi iNkosi yakhuluma kuMose, ithi: Bheka, ngembula kuwe ngokuphathelene naleli zulu, nangalo mhlaba; wabhale amazwi engiwakhulumayo. NgiyisiQalo nesiPhetho, uNkulunkulu uMninimandla Onke; ngo Zelwe Yedwa wami ngazi dala lezi zinto; yebo, ekuqaleni ngadala izulu, nomhlaba omi kuwo.
Futhi umhlaba wawungenasimo, futhi wawungenalutho; futhi ngenza ubumnyama bube phezu kwamanzi amaningi; futhi uMoya wami wawuzula phezu kwamanzi; ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Makubekhona ukukhanya; futhi kwaba khona ukukhanya.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngakubona ukukhanya, nokuthi ukukhanya kwaku kuhle. Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngakuhlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabiza ukukhanya ngeMini; ubumnyama, ngabubiza ngoBusuku, futhi lokhu ngakwenza ngezwi lamandla ami, futhi kwenzeka ngesikhathi ngikhuluma; futhi ukuhlwa nokusa kwaba wusuku lokuqala.

Futhi phezu kwalokho, mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Makubekhona umkhathi phakathi kwamanzi, futhi kwaba njalo, ngisho ngesikhathi ngikhuluma; futhi ngathi: Mawuhlukanise amanzi kwamanye amanzi; futhi kwenzeka;
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngenza umkhathi futhi ngawahlukanisa amanzi, yebo, amanzi amakhulu angaphansi komkhathi emanzini ayengaphezulu komkhathi, futhi kwaba njalo ngisho ngesikhathi ngikhuluma.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabiza umkhathi ngokuthi iZulu; futhi ukuhlwa nokusa kwaba wusuku lwesibili.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Amanzi angaphansi kwezulu mawabuthane ndawonye endaweni eyodwa, futhi kwaba njalo; futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Makubekhona izwe elomileyo; futhi kwaba njalo.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabiza izwe elomileyo ngo Mhlaba; futhi ukubuthana ndawonye kwamanzi, ngakubiza ngoLwandle; futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabona ukuthi zonke izinto engangi zenzileyo zazi zinhle.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Izwe maliveze utshani, imifino eveza imbewu, imithi yezithelo ethela izithelo, ngezinhlobo zazo, nemithi ithele izithelo, imbewu yazo okufanele ibe kuzo ezweni, futhi kwaba njalo ngisho ngesikhathi ngikhuluma.

Futhi izwe lase liveza utshani, imifino yonke eveza imbewu ngezinhlobo zayo, nemithi ethela izithelo, imbewu yayo okufanele ibe kuyo, ngezinhlobo zayo; futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabona ukuthi zonke izinto engangizenzile zazi zinhle;
Futhi ukuhlwa nokusa kwaba wusuku lwesithathu.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Makubekhona izinkanyiso emkhathini wezulu, ukuhlukanisa imini nobusuku, futhi mazikhombise izibonakaliso, izinkathi, nezinsuku, neminyaka;
Futhi mazibe yizinkanyiso emkhathini wezulu ukuze zinike ukukhanya emhlabeni; futhi kwaba njalo.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngenza izinkanyiso ezimbili ezinkulu; inkanyiso enkulu ukuba ibuse imini, nenkanyiso encane ukuba ibuse ubusuku, inkanyiso enkulu kwaba yilanga, inkanyiso encane kwaba yinyanga; nezinkanyezi nazo zenziwa ngisho ngokwezwi lami.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngazibeka emkhathini wezulu ukuba zikhanyise emhlabeni.
Futhi ilanga ukuba libuse imini, inyanga ibuse ubusuku, futhi ukuhlukanisa ukukhanya nobumnyama; futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabona ukuthi zonke izinto engangizenzile zazi zinhle;
Futhi ukuhlwa nokusa kwaba usuku lwesine.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Amanzi mawagcwale ngobuningi izilwane eziphilayo, nezinyoni ezindizayo phezu kwezwe emkhathini ovulekileyo wezulu.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngadala imikhoma emikhulu, nezilwane zonke eziphilayo ezihambayo, ezavezwa amanzi ngobuningi, ngezinhlobo zazo, futhi nezinyoni zonke ezinamaphiko ngezinhlobo zazo; futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabona ukuthi zonke izinto engangizidalile zazi zinhle.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngazibusisa, ngathi: Zalanani, futhi nande, futhi nigcwalise amanzi olwandle; futhi izinyoni mazande emhlabeni;
Futhi ubusuku nokusa kwaba wusuku lwesihlanu.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Izwe maliveze izilwane eziphilayo ngezinhlobo zazo, imfuyo, nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, nezilo zomhlaba ngezinhlobo zazo, futhi kwabanjalo;

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu ngenza izilo zomhlaba ngezinhlobo zazo, nemfuyo ngezinhlobo zayo, nazo zonke izinto ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ngezinhlobo zazo; futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabona ukuthi zonke lezi zinto zazi zinhle.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi ko Zelwe Yedwa wami, owayenami kusuka ekuqaleni: Masenze umuntu ngomfanekiso wethu, afane nathi; futhi kwaba njalo. Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Mababuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, naphezu kwezinyoni zezulu, naphezu kwemfuyo, naphezu kwawo wonke umhlaba, naphezu kwazo zonke izinto ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngadala umuntu ngomfanekiso wami uqobo, ngomfanekiso woZelwe Yedwa wami ngamdala; owesilisa nowesifazane ngabadala.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngababusisa, ngathi kubo: Zalanani, nande, nigcwalise umhlaba, futhi niwulawule, nibuse phezu kwezinhlanzi zolwandle, naphezu kwezinyoni zezulu, naphezu kwazo zonke izinto eziphilayo ezihambayo emhlabeni.

Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngathi kumuntu: Bheka, ngikunike yonke imifino eveza imbewu, esebusweni bawo wonke umhlaba, nayo yonke imithi okuyobakhona isithelo somuthi esiveza imbewu; kuwe kuyoba ukudla.

Futhi kuzo zonke izilwane zomhlaba, nakuzo zonke izinyoni zezulu, nakukho konke okunwabuzelayo emhlabeni, engikupha impilo, kuyonikwa yonke imifino ehlanzekile efanele ibe ngukudla; futhi kwaba njalo, ngisho ngesikhathi ngikhuluma.
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngazibona zonke izinto engase ngizenzile, futhi, bheka, zonke izinto engase ngizenzile zazi zinhle kakhulu; ubusuku nokusa kwaba wusuku lwesithupha.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/3.title: Mose 3
chapter_summary: UNkulunkulu wadala zonke izinto ngokomoya ngaphambi kokuba zibe ngokwemvelo emhlabeni—Wadala indoda, inyama yokuqala, emhlabeni—Owesifazane ungumsizi wendoda.
subtitle: (Juni–Oktoba ngo1830)

verses.text: Ngalendlela izulu nomhlaba kwaqedwa, kanye nombuthano wakho wonke.

Futhi ngosuku lwesikhombisa mina, uNkulunkulu, ngawuqeda umsebenzi wami, nazo zonke izinto engase ngizenzile; futhi ngaphumula ngo suku lwesikhombisa kuwo wonke umsebenzini wami, futhi zonke izinto engase ngizenzile zase ziqediwe, futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngabona ukuthi zazi zinhle;
Futhi mina, uNkulunkulu, ngalu busisa usuku lwesikhombisa, futhi ngalungcwelisa; ngokuba ngalolo suku ngaphumula kuwo wonke umsebenzi mina, uNkulunkulu, engase ngiwudalile futhi ngawenza.
Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe, lezi yizinxenye zezulu nomhlaba, ngesikhathi zidalwa, mhla mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngenza izulu nomhlaba.

Futhi zonke izitshalo zasendle zingakabi bikho emhlabeni, futhi nayo yonke imifino yasendle ngaphambi kokuba ikhule. Ngokuba mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngazidala zonke izinto, esengikhulume ngazo, ngokomoya, ngaphambi kokuba zibe khona ngokwemvelo ebusweni bomhlaba. Ngokuba mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngangingakenzi ukuba imvula ine ebusweni bomhlaba. Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngase ngiba dalile bonke abantwana babantu; futhi kungakabi bikho muntu owayezolima umhlabathi; ngokuba ezulwini ngabadala; futhi kwakungakabi bikho okuphilayo emhlabeni, noma emanzini, noma emkhathini;
Kodwa mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngakhuluma, futhi kwenyuka inkungu ivela emhlabathini, yanisela ubuso bonke bomhlabathi.

Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngambumba umuntu ngo thuli lomhlabathi, futhi ngaphefumelela emakhaleni akhe umoya wokuphila; futhi umuntu waba ngumuntu ophilayo, inyama yokuqala emhlabeni, umuntu wokuqala futhi; nokho, zonke izinto zazidalwe ngaphambilini; kodwa ngokomoya zazidaliwe futhi zenziwe ngokwezwi lami.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngatshala insimu e-Edene ngasempumalanga, futhi lapho ngambeka khona umuntu engangimenzile.

Futhi emhlabathini ngenza mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ukuba kumile yonke imithi, ngokwemvelo, egculisayo emehlweni omuntu; futhi umuntu wayengayibona. Futhi nayo yaba yimithi ephilayo. Ngokuba yayingumoya ngosuku engayidala ngalo; ngokuba yayihleli kuleyondawo lapho mina, uNkulunkulu, engangiyidalele khona, yebo, ngisho zonke izinto engazilungiselela ukusetshenziswa ngumuntu; futhi umuntu wabona ukuthi zazilungele ukuba ngukudla. Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngatshala umuthi wokuphila maphakathi nensimu, futhi nomuthi wokwazi okuhle nokubi.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngenza ukuba umfula ugobhoze e-Edene ukunisela insimu; futhi kusuka lapho wahlukana, futhi waba yimifula emine.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngawubiza owokuqala ngegama lokuthi iPishoni; futhi wawuzungeza izwe lonke laseHavila, lapho mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, engadala khona igolide eliningi.
Futhi igolide lalelozwe lalilihle, futhi kwakukhona itshe lebedola netshe leshohamu.
Futhi igama lomfula wesibili wabizwa ngeGihoni; yiwo ozungeza lonke izwe laseKushe.
Futhi igama lomfula wesithathu lalinguHidekeli; lowo oya ngasempumalanga yase-Asiriya. Futhi owesine umfula kwakuyi-Ewufrathe.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngase ngimthatha umuntu, ngambeka eNsimini yase-Edene, ukuba ayilime, futhi ayigcine.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngamyala umuntu, ngathi: Kuyo yonke imithi yensimu ungadla ngokuthanda kwakho,
Kepha emthini wokwazi okuhle nokubi, ungadli kuwo, nokho, ungazikhethela, ngokuba kunikiwe kuwe; kepha, khumbula ukuthi ngiyakwenqabela lokho, ngokuba ngosuku oyokudla ngalo kuwo uyokufa nokufa.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi ko Zelwe Yedwa wami, akukuhle ukuba umuntu ahlale yedwa; ngalokho-ke, ngizomenzela umsizi wakhe.

Futhi ngomhlabathi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngabumba zonke izilwane zasendle, nezinyoni zonke zezulu, futhi ngayala ukuthi ziye ku-Adamu, ukuba abone ukuthi uziqamba ngokuthini; nazo futhi zaba yizidalwa eziphilayo; ngokuba mina, uNkulunkulu, ngaphefumulela kuzo umoya wokuphila, futhi ngayala ukuthi noma yiliphi igama u-Adamu aziqamba ngalo, lokhu kube igama lazo.
Futhi u-Adamu waziqamba amagama zonke izinkomo, nezinyoni zezulu, futhi nazo zonke izilwane zasendle; kepha mayelana no-Adamu, wayengakatholelwa umsizi wakhe.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngamehlisela ubuthongo obukhulu u-Adamu; futhi walala, ngase ngithatha olulodwa lwezimbambo zakhe futhi ngavala ngenyama esikhundleni salo;
Futhi ngobambo mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, engase ngiluthathe endodeni, ngenza owesifazane, futhi ngamyisa endodeni.
Futhi u-Adamu wayesethi: Lona ngiyazi manje ukuthi uyithambo lamathambo ami, nenyama yenyama yami; uyobizwa ngokuthi owesiFazane ngokuba wayethathwe endodeni.
Ngakho-ke indoda iyoshiya uyise nonina, futhi inamathele kumfazi wayo; futhi bayokuba nyamanye.
Futhi bobabili babehamba ze, indoda nomfazi wayo, futhi babengenamahloni.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/4.title: Mose 4
chapter_summary: USathane waba kanjani ngudeveli—Ulinga u-Eva—U-Adamu no-Eva bawela esonweni, futhi ukufa kuyangena emhlabeni.
subtitle: (Juni–Oktoba ngo1830)

verses.text: Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunklu, ngakhuluma kuMose, ngithi: Lowo Sathane, omyalileyo ngegama loZelwe Yedwa wami, kusenguye owayese kuqaleni, futhi weza phambi kwami, ethi—Bheka, nangu mina, ngithume, ngiyoba yindodana yakho, futhi ngiyobahlenga bonke abantu, ukuze kungalahleki noyedwa, futhi ngempela ngiyokwenza, ngalokho-ke nginike udumo lwakho.
Kodwa, bheka, iNdodana yami eThandekayo, eyayingoThandiweyo futhi no Khethiweyo kusuka ekuqaleni, yathi kimi—Baba, intando yakho mayenziwe, inkazimulo makube ngeyakho phakade.

Ngalokho-ke, ngokuba lowo Sathane wangivukela, futhi wafuna ukuqeda ilungelo lokuzikhethela lomuntu, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, engangimnike lona, kanye nokuthi, kufanele ngimnike amandla ami uqobo; ngamandla oZelwe Yedwa wami, ngenza ukuthi aphoswe phansi;

Futhi waba nguSathane, yebo, ngisho udeveli, uyise wawo wonke amanga, ukuze akhohlise futhi aphuphuthekisa abantu, futhi abaholele ekuthunjweni ngokwentando yakhe, ngisho abaningi abangeke balilalele izwi lami.
Manje inyoka yayi nobuqili kakhulu kunazo zonke izilwane zasendle mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, engangizenzile.

Futhi uSathane wakufaka enhliziyweni yenyoka, (ngokuba wayeseyenge abaningi beza kuye,) futhi wafuna nokukhohlisa u-Eva, ngokuba wayengawazi umqondo kaNkulunkulu, ngalokho-ke wayefuna ukubhubhisa umhlaba.
Futhi wathi kowesifazane: Yebo, ngabe ushilo yini uNkulunkulu ukuthi—Aniyukudla kuyo yonke imithi yase nsimini na? (Futhi wakhuluma ngomlomo wenyoka.)
Futhi owesifazane wathi enyokeni: Singazidla izithelo zemithi yasensimini;
Kepha isithelo somuthi osibona maphakathi nensimu, uNkulunkulu uthe: Aniyukudla kuso, futhi aniyukusithinta, funa nife.
Futhi inyoka yathi kowesifazane: Aniyukufa nokufa;
Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyazi ukuthi mhla nisidla, emva kwalokho amehlo enu ayovuleka, futhi niyoba njengonkulunkulu, nazi okuhle nokubi.

Kwathi owesifazane ebona ukuthi umuthi wawulungele ukudliwa, nokuthi wawugculisa emehlweni, nokuthi wawungumuthi owawu langazeleka ukumenza ahlakaniphe, wasithatha isithelo sawo, wadla, futhi wanika nomyeni wakhe owayenaye, naye wadla.
Futhi namehlo abo bobabili avuleka, futhi bazi ukuthi bebe hamba ze. Futhi bathunga amaqabunga omkhiwane ndawonye futhi bazenzela izibhinco.
Futhi bezwa izwi leNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngesikhathi besahamba ensimini, ntambama; futhi u-Adamu nomfazi wakhe bahamba bayoyicashela iNkosi uNkulunkulu phakathi kwemithi yensimu.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngambiza u-Adamu, ngathi kuye: Ngabe uhamba kuphi na?
Yena wathi: Ngizwe izwi lakho ensimini, futhi ngesaba, ngokuba ngibone ukuthi ngihamba ze, futhi ngacasha.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi ku-Adamu: Ubani okutshele ukuthi uhamba ze na? Ngabe usudlile yini emthini engikuyale ukuthi ungadli kuwo na, uma kunjalo uyofa nokufa?
Futhi indoda yathi: Owesifazane ongiphe yena, futhi wayala ukuthi kufanele ahlale nami, unginikile isithelo somuthi ngadla.
Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi kowesifazane: Yini lena oyenzileyo na? Futhi owesifazane wathi: Inyoka ingikhohlisile, ngadla.

Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi enyokeni: Njengoba usukwenzile lokhu uyo qalekiswa ngaphezu kwayo yonke imfuyo, futhi nangaphezu kwazo zonke izilwane zasendle; uyohamba ngesisu sakho, futhi uyodla uthuli izinsuku zonke zempilo yakho;
Futhi ngiyobeka ubutha phakathi kwakho nowesifazane, naphakathi kwenzalo yakho nenzalo yakhe; futhi yona iyochoboza ikhanda lakho, wena uyolimaza isithende sayo.
Kowesifazane, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Ngizokwandisa kakhulu ubuhlungu ekukhulelweni kwakho. Ngo buhlungu uyozala abantwana, futhi ukunxanela kwakho kuyoba sendodeni yakho, futhi iyokubusa.

Futhi ku-Adamu, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi: Njengoba ulalele izwi lomfazi wakho, futhi wadla kuleso sithelo somuthi engakuyala ngaso, ngathi—Ungadli kuso, uyoqalekiswa umhlabathi ngenxa yakho; ngobunzima uyodla kuwo zonke izinsuku zempilo yakho.
Futhi ameva, namakhakhasi uyokuvezela wona, futhi uyodla imifino yasendle.
Ngesithukuthuku sobuso bakho uyodla isinkwa, uze ubuyele emhlabathini—ngokuba uyokufa nokufa—ngokuba wathathwa kuwo: ngokuba wawu luthuli, futhi uyophindela othulini.

Futhi u-Adamu wamqamba umfazi wakhe igama lokuthi u-Eva, ngokuba waba ngunina wabo bonke abaphilayo; ngamanye amazwi njengoba sekushiwo mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngamqamba owokuqala wabo bonke abesifazane, okungabaningi.
Ku-Adamu, nomfazi wakhe, mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngabenzela iziphuku zezikhumba, futhi ngaba gqokisa.

Futhi mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngathi koZelwe Yedwa wami: Bheka, umuntu usenjengomunye wethu ukwazi okuhle nokubi; manje funa elule isandla sakhe futhi aphinde adle emthini wokuphila, futhi adle bese ephila ingunaphakade,
Ngakho-ke mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngizommukisa eNsimini yase-Edene, ukuba ayolima umhlabathi athathwe kuwo;
Ngokuba njengoba mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ngiphila, kanjalo-ke namazwi ami ngeke angagcwaliseki, ngokuba njengoba ephuma emlonyeni wami kufanele afezeke.
Ngakho-ke ngayixosha indoda, futhi ngabeka ngasempumalanga yeNsimu yase-Edene, ikherubi kanye nenkemba evuthayo, ephenduphendukayo ivikele indlela eya emthini wokuphila.

(Futhi lawa ngamazwi engawakhuluma encekwini yami uMose, futhi ayiqiniso ngisho njengoba ngithanda; futhi sengiwakhulume kuwe. Bona ukuthi awuwatshengisi muntu, ngize ngikuyale, ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo. Amen.)

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/5.title: Mose 5
chapter_summary: U-Adamu no-Eva bazala abantwana—U-Adamu wenza umnikelo futhi usebenzela uNkulunkulu—UKayini no-Abela bayazalwa—UKayini uyahlubuka, uthanda uSathane ngaphezu kukaNkulunkulu, futhi uba wukuLahlwa—Ukubulala nobubi kuyanda—Ivangeli liyashunyayelwa kusuka ekuqaleni.
subtitle: (Juni–Oktoba ngo1830)

verses.text: Futhi kwenzeka emuva kokuba mina, iNkosi uNkulunkulu, sengibaxoshile, u-Adamu waqala walima umhlabathi, futhi wabusa phezu kwazo zonke izilwane zasendle, futhi wadla isinkwa sakhe ngesithukuthuku sesiphongo sakhe, njengoba mina iNkosi ngangimyalile. Futhi u-Eva, naye, umfazi wakhe, wasebenza naye.
Futhi u-Adamu wamazi umfazi wakhe, futhi wamzalela amadodana namadodakazi, futhi baqala banda futhi bagcwalisa umhlaba.
Futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi, amadodana namadodakazi ka-Adamu aqala ukuhlukana ngababili ezweni, futhi balima izwe, futhi bafuya imihlambi, nabo bazala amadodana namadodakazi.
Futhi u-Adamu no-Eva, umfazi wakhe, babiza igama leNkosi, futhi bezwa izwi leNkosi liphuma endleleni eya ngaseNsimini yase-Edene, likhuluma nabo, futhi bangayibona; ngokuba base behlukanisiwe nayo.

Futhi wabanika imiyalelo, yokuthi kufanele bakhonze iNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo, futhi nokuthi kufanele banikele ngamazibulo emihlambi yabo, ukuze kube ngumnikelo kuNkulunkulu. Futhi u-Adamu wayi thobela imiyalelo yeNkosi.
Futhi emuva kwezinsuku eziningi ingelosi yeNkosi yavela ku-Adamu, ithi: Unikelelani iminikelo eNkosini na? Futhi u-Adamu wathi kuye: Angazi, ngaphandle kokuthi iNkosi ingiyalile.
Futhi ingelosi yakhuluma, ithi: Lokhu kufana no mnikelo woZelwe Yedwa kaBaba, ogcwele umusa neqiniso.
Ngalokho-ke, wokwenza konke okwenzayo egameni leNdodana, futhi wo phenduka ubize uNkulunkulu egameni leNdodana ingunaphakade.

Futhi ngalolosuku uMoya oNgcwele wehlela phezu kuka-Adamu, owafakaza ngoBaba neNdodana, uthi: Ngingo Zelwe Yedwa kaBaba kusuka ekuqaleni, kusuka namanje futhi naphakade, ukuthi njengoba niwile ninga hlengwa, futhi wonke umuntu, ngisho abaningi abayothanda.

Futhi ngalolo suku u-Adamu wambonga uNkulunkulu futhi wa gcwaliswa, futhi waqala ukuphrofetha ngokuphathelene nayo yonke imindeni yasemhlabeni, ethi: Libusisiwe igama likaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngenxa yesiphambeko sami amehlo ami avulekile, futhi kulempilo ngiyoba nokujabula, futhi ngizophinda enyameni ngimbone uNkulunkulu.

Futhi u-Eva, umfazi wakhe, wazizwa zonke lezi zinto futhi wajabula, ethi: Ukuba kwakungave kungenxa yesiphambeko sethu sasingeke siyithole inzalo, futhi sasingeke sazi okuhle nokubi, nenjabulo yokuhlengwa kwethu, nokuphila okuphakade uNkulunkulu akunika bonke abalalelayo.
Futhi u-Adamu no-Eva balibusisa igama likaNkulunkulu, futhi bazembula zonke izinto kumadodana abo nakumadodakazi abo.

Futhi uSathane weza phakathi kwabo, ethi: Nami futhi ngiyindodana kaNkulunkulu; futhi wabayala, ethi: Ningakukholwa; futhi bangakukholwa, futhi bamthanda uSathane ngaphezu kukaNkulunkulu. Futhi abantu baqala kusuka ngaleso sikhathi ukunaka inyama, ukuthokozisa imizwa, nokuba nobudeveli.
Futhi iNkosi uNkulunkulu yababiza abantu ngo Moya oNgcwele yonke indawo futhi yabayala ukuthi baphenduke;

Futhi ngobuningi kwabakholwa yiNdodana, futhi bephenduka ezonweni zabo, kufanele basindiswe; futhi ngobuningi kwabangakholwa futhi bengaphenduki, kufanele babe ngaphansi kwamandla kaSathane; futhi lamazwi aphuma emlonyeni kaNkulunkulu ngesimemezelo esiqinile; ngalokho-ke kufanele agcwaliseke.

Futhi u-Adamu no-Eva, umkakhe, abayekanga ukubiza uNkulunkulu. Futhi u-Adamu wamazi u-Eva umfazi wakhe, wakhulelwa wazala uKayini, futhi wathi: Ngifumene indoda eNkosini; ngalokho-ke akufanele iwenqabe amazwi ayo. Kodwa bheka, uKayini akalalelanga, ethi: Ingubani iNkosi ukuthi kufanele ngiyazi na?
Futhi waphinde wakhulelwa wazala umfowabo u-Abela. U-Abela walilalela izwi leNkosi. Futhi u-Abela wayengumalusi wezimvu, kodwa uKayini wayengumlimi womhlabathi.
Futhi uKayini wathanda kakhulu uSathane kuno Nkulunkulu. USathane wamyala, ethi: Letha umnikelo eNkosini.
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwenzeka ukuthi uKayini waletha isithelo zomhlabathi zaba umnikelo eNkosini.
Futhi u-Abela, naye waletha amazibulo emfuyo yakhe, futhi ezinonileyo zazo. Futhi iNkosi yanaka u-Abela, nomnikelo wakhe;
Kodwa kuKayini, nomnikelo wakhe, akawunakanga. Manje uSathane wayekwazi lokhu, futhi kwamthokozisa. Futhi uKayini wathukuthela kakhulu, nobuso bakhe banyukubala.
Futhi iNkosi yathi kuKayini: Uthukutheleleni na? Ubuso bakho bunyukubeleleni na?

Uma wenza kahle, uyo kwemukeleka. Futhi uma ungenzi kahle, isono silinde emnyango, futhi uSathane ufuna ukukuzuza; ngaphandle kokuba ulalele imiyalelo yami, ngizokunikela, futhi kuyoba kuwe njengokwezifiso zakhe. Futhi wena uzobusa phezu kwakhe;
Ngokuba kusuka ngalesi sikhathi uyoba ngubaba wamanga akhe; uyobizwa ngo kuLahlwa; ngokuba nawe wawukhona umhlaba ungakabi bikho.

Futhi kuyothiwa esikhathini esizayo—lezi zinengiso zatholwa kuKayini; ngokuba wasenqaba iseluleko esikhulu esasiphuma kuNkulunkulu; futhi lesi yisiqalekiso engiyosibeka phezu kwakho, ngaphandle uma uphenduka.
Futhi uKayini wathukuthela, futhi wangaphinde walilalela izwi leNkosi, noma lika-Abela, umfowabo, owayehamba ngokungcwele phambi kweNkosi.
Futhi u-Adamu nomfazi wakhe balila phambi kweNkosi, ngenxa kaKayini nabafowabo.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uKayini wathatha enye yamadodakazi amfowabo wayenza umfazi wakhe, futhi bathanda uSathane kakhulu kuno Nkulunkulu.

Futhi uSathane wathi kuKayini: Funga kimi ngomqala wakho, uma ukuveza lokhu uyokufa; futhi fungisa abafowenu ngamakhanda abo, nangoNkulunkulu ophilayo, ukuthi ngeke bakuveze lokhu, ngokuba uma bekuveza, bayokufa nokufa; futhi lokhu ukuze uyihlo angakwazi; futhi ngalolusuku ngizomletha umfowenu u-Abela ezandleni zakho.
Futhi uSathane wafunga kuKayini ukuthi uyokwenza ngokwemiyalelo yakhe. Zonke lezi zinto zenziwa ngasese.
Futhi uKayini wathi: Ngempela nginguMahani, ingcweti yalemfihlo enkulu, yokuthi nginga bulala futhi ngizuze. Ngalokho-ke uKayini wabizwa nge Ngcweti uMahani, futhi waziqhayisa ngobubi bakhe.
Futhi uKayini waya yehlane, wakhuluma no-Abela, umfowabo. Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi ngesikhathi besehlane, uKayini wamhlasela u-Abela, umfowabo, futhi wambulala.
Futhi uKayini waziqhayisa ngalokho ayekwenzile, ethi: Sengikhululekile; impela imihlambi yomfowethu iwela ezandleni zami.
Futhi iNkosi yathi kuKayini: Uphi u-Abela, umfowenu na? Futhi wathi: Angazi. Ngabe ngingumvikeli womfowethu na?
Futhi iNkosi yathi: Wenzeni na? Izwi legazi lomfowenu liyakala kimi lisemhlabathini.
Manje uyoqalekiswa ngokuphathelene nomhlabathi ovule umlomo wawo ukwamukela igazi lomfowenu elivela esandleni sakho.
Uma ulima umhlabathi kusuka manje awusayikukunika ngamandla awo. Uyoba ngumhambuma nozulane emhlabeni.

Futhi uKayini wathi eNkosini: USathane ungilingile ngenxa yemihlambi kamfowethu. Futhi ngaphinda ngathukuthela; ngokuba wawemukela umnikelo wakhe hhayi owami; isijeziso sami sikhulu kunokuba ngikwazi ukusithwala.

Bheka namuhla ungixoshile ebusweni beNkosi, futhi ebusweni bakho ngiyocashiswa; futhi ngiyoba ngumhambuma nozulane emhlabeni; futhi kuyokwenzeka, ukuthi ongitholayo uyongibulala, ngenxa yobubi bami obukhulu, ngokuba lezi zinto azifihliwe eNkosini.
Futhi mina iNkosi ngathi kuye: Noma ngubani okubulalayo, kuyophindiselwa kuye kasikhombisa. Futhi mina iNkosi ngabeka uphawu kuKayini, funa omtholayo ambulale.
Futhi uKayini wabe esesuswa eduze neNkosi, futhi umfazi wakhe nabafowabo abaningi bahlala ezweni laseNodi, ngasempumalanga yase-Edene.

Futhi uKayini wamazi umfazi wakhe, futhi wakhulelwa wazala u-Enoke, futhi naye wazala amadodana namadodakazi amaningi. Futhi wakha idolobha, futhi waliqamba lelo dolobha ngegama lendodana yakhe u-Enoke.

Futhi ku-Enoke kwazalwa u-Irade, namanye amadodana namadodakazi. Futhi u-Irade wazala uMahujayele, namanye amadodana namadodakazi. Futhi uMahujayele wazala uMetushayele, namanye amadodana namadodakazi. Futhi uMetushayele wazala uLameka.
Futhi uLameka wazithathela abafazi ababili; igama lomunye lalingu-Ada, igama lomunye lalinguSila.
Futhi u-Ada wazala uJabale; waba nguyise walabo ababehlala ematendeni, futhi babefuya imfuyo; futhi igama lomfowabo lalinguJubale, yena waba nguyise wabo bonke ababephatha ihabhu nogubhu.
Futhi uSila, naye wazala uThubali-Kayini, owayengumfundisi wazo zonke izinto zethusi nezensimbi. Futhi udade wabo kaThubali-Kayini wayebizwa ngoNahama.
Futhi uLameka wathi kubafazi bakhe, u-Ada noSila: Yizwani izwi lami, nina bafazi baLameka, lalelani inkulumo yami; ngokuba ngibulale umuntu futhi kuyisilonda kimi.
Uma uKayini eyophindiselelwa kasikhombisa, impela uLameka kuyoba ngamashumi ayisikhombisa nesikhombisa;

Ngokuba uLameka esengenile kuso isivumelwano noSathane, ngendlela kaKayini, ngaso aba yiNgcweti uMahana, ingcweti yaleyo mfihlo enkulu eyanikwa uKayini nguSathane; futhi u-Irade, indodana ka-Enoke, eseyazile imfihlo yabo, waqala ukuyembula emadodaneni ka-Adamu;
Ngalokho-ke uLameka, ethukuthele, wambulala, hhayi njengoKayini, umfowabo u-Abela, ukuze azuze, kodwa wambulala ngenxa yesifungo.
Ngokuba, kusuka ngezinsuku zikaKayini, kwakuno zungu, futhi imisebenzi yabo yayingeyobumnyama, futhi wonke umuntu wayemazi umuntu wakubo.

Ngalokho-ke iNkosi yamqalekisa uLameka, nendlu yakhe, nabo bonke ababevumelene noSathane; ngokuba abayigcinanga imiyalelo kaNkulunkulu, futhi akumthokozisanga uNkulunkulu, futhi akabasebenzelanga, nemisebenzi yabo yayiyizinengiso, futhi yaqala yanda phakathi kwawo wonke amadodana abantu. Futhi lolu zungu lwaba phakathi kwamadodana abantu.

Futhi phakathi kwamadodakazi abantu lezi zinto zazingakhulunywa, ngokuba uLameka wayekhulume ngale mfihlo kubafazi bakhe, futhi bamvukela, futhi bazimemezela kude lezi zinto, futhi babengenalo uzwelo.
Ngalokho-ke uLameka wadeleleka, futhi walahlwa, futhi wangeza phakathi kwamadodana abantu, funa afe.
Futhi ngalendlela imisebenzi yo bumnyama yaqala ukubusa phakathi kwawo wonke amadodana abantu.
Futhi uNkulunkulu wawuqalekisa umhlaba ngesiqalekiso esibuhlungu, futhi wayebathukuthelele ababi, wonke amadodana abantu ayewenzileyo;
Ngokuba babengafuni ukulilalela izwi lakhe, noma bakholwe yi Ndodana eZelwe Yodwa yakhe, ngisho lowo amemezela ukuthi kufanele eze maphakathi nesikhathi, owayelungiswe ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba.

Futhi ngenxa yalokhu iVangeli laqala ukushunyayelwa, kusuka ekuqaleni, limenyezelwa yizingelosi ezingcwele ezazithunywe zisuka phambi kukaNkulunkulu, nangezwi lakhe uqobo, nangesipho sika Moya oNgcwele.

Futhi ngalendlela zonke izinto zaqiniswa ku-Adamu, ngesimiso esingcwele, neVangeli lashunyayelwa, nomyalelo wathunyelwa, ukuthi iVangeli kufanele libe semhlabeni, kuze kube sekupheleni kwawo; futhi kwaba njalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/6.title: Mose 6
chapter_summary: Inzalo ka-Adamu igcina incwadi yokukhumbula—Isizukulwane sakhe esilungileyo sishumayela ukuphenduka—UNkulunkulu uyazembula ku-Enoke—U-Enoke ushumayela ivangeli—Isu lensindiso lembulwa ku-Adamu—Wafumana ukubhabhadiswa nobuphristi.
subtitle: (Novemba–Disemba 1830)

verses.text: Futhi u-Adamu walilalela izwi likaNkulunkulu, futhi wabiza amadodana akhe ukuba aphenduke.

Futhi u-Adamu waphinda wamazi umfazi wakhe, futhi wazala indodana, wayibiza igama ngokuthi uSeti. U-Adamu walidumisa igama likaNkulunkulu; ngokuba wathi: UNkulunkulu ungiphe enye inzalo, esikhundleni sika-Abela, owabulawa nguKayini.
Futhi uNkulunkulu wazembula kuSeti, futhi wangahlubuka, kodwa wanikela ngo mnikela owamukelekayo, njengowomfowabo u-Abela. Futhi nakuye kwazalwa indodana, futhi wayibiza ngokuthi ngu-Enoshe.
Futhi ngaleso sikhathi lamadoda aqala ukubiza igama leNkosi, futhi iNkosi yababusisa;
Futhi incwadi yokukhumbula yagcinwa, okwakubhalwe kuyo, ngolimi luka-Adamu, ngokuba kwanikwa kwabaningi kangangoba babebizwe nguNkulunkulu ukuba babhale ngomoya woku shisekeliswa.
Futhi ngabo abantwana babo bafundiswa ukufunda nokubhala, benolimi olwalumsulwa futhi lungangcolile.
Manje lobu buPhristi, obabukhona ekuqaleni, buyoba khona nasekupheleni komhlaba futhi.

Manje lesi siphrofetho u-Adamu wasikhuluma, njengoba wayeqhutshwa ngu Moya oNgcwele, futhi umlando wesizukulwane wagcinwa wa bantwana baNkulunkulu. Futhi lena kwaku yincwadi yezizukulwane zika-Adamu, ithi: Ngosuku uNkulunkulu adala ngalo umuntu, ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu wamenza;

Ngomfanekiso womzimba wakhe uqobo, owesilisa nowesifazane, wabadala bona, futhi wababusisa, wababiza ngokuthi u-Adamu, ngosuku abadalwa ngalo futhi baba ngabantu abaphilayo ezweni eliyi senabelo sesihlalo sikaNkulunkulu.
Futhi u-Adamu waphila iminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amathathu, wazala indodana efana naye, ingomfanekiso wakhe uqobo, futhi wayibiza ngokuthi nguSeti.
Futhi izinsuku zika Adamu, emuva kokuzala uSeti, zaba yiminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi amaningi;
Futhi zonke izinsuku u-Adamu aziphila zazingamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye namashumi amathathu eminyaka, futhi wayesefa.

USeti waphila iminyaka eyikhulu nesihlanu, futhi wazala u-Enoshe, futhi waphrofetha izinsuku zonke zakhe, futhi wafundisa indodana yakhe u-Enoshe ngezindlela zikaNkulunkulu; ngalokho-ke u-Enoshe naye waphrofetha.
Futhi USeti waphila, emuva kokuzalwa kuka-Enoshe, iminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili nesikhombisa, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi amaningi.

Futhi abantwana babantu base bebaningi ebusweni bezwe. Futhi kulezo zinsuku uSathane wabusa kakhulu phakathi kwabantu, futhi wadlanga ezinhliziyweni zabo; futhi kusukela ngaleso sikhathi kwabakhona izimpi nokucitheka kwegazi; futhi isandla somuntu sasimelene nomfowabo, kukho ukubulala, ngenxa yemisebenzi eyimfihlo, befuna amandla.
Zonke izinsuku zikaSeti zaba yiminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye neshumi nambili, futhi wayesefa.

Futhi u-Enoshe waphila iminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye, wazala uKhenani. U-Enoshe nabaseleyo babantu baNkulunkulu baphuma ezweni, elalibizwa ngokuthi iShuloni, futhi wahlala ezweni lesethembiso, alibiza ngegama lendodana yakhe, ayeyibize ngoKhenani

Futhi u-Enoshe waphila, emuva kokuzala uKhenani, iminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili neshumi nanhlanu, wazala amadodana namadodakazi amaningi. Zonke izinsuku zika-Enoshe zaba ngamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye nesihlanu, wayesefa.

Futhi uKhenani waphila iminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa wazala uMahalalele; UKhenani waphila emuva kokuzala uMahalalele iminyaka engamakhulua ayisishiyagalombili namashumi amane, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi. Futhi zonke izinsuku zikaKhenani zaba yiminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye neshumi, wayesefa.

Futhi uMahalalele waphila iminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu, futhi wazala uJarede; UMahalalele waphila, emuva kokuzala uJarede, iminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili namashumi amathathu, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi. Zonke izinsuku zikaMahalalele zaba ngamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nanhlanu, wayesefa.

Futhi uJarede waphila iminyaka eyikhulu namashumi ayisithupha nambili, futhi wazala u-Enoke; UJarede waphila, emuva kokuzala u-Enoke, iminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi. Futhi uJarede wafundisa u-Enoke zonke izindlela zikaNkulunkulu.
Lona ngumlando wesizukulwane samadodana ka-Adamu, owayeyi ndodana kaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uqobo owayekhuluma naye.
Futhi babenga bashumayeli bokulunga, futhi babe khuluma futhi bephrofetha, futhi babe biza bonke abantu, yonke indawo, ukuba baphenduke; futhi ukholo lwalu fundiswa kubantwana babantu.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi zonke izinsuku zikaJarede zaba ngamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye namashumi ayisithupha nambili, wayesefa.
Futhi u-Enoke waphila iminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu, wazala uMetushela.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wahamba ezweni, phakathi kwabantu; futhi ngesikhathi esahamba, uMoya kaNkulunkulu wehla uphuma ezulwini, wahlala kuye.

Futhi wezwa izwi livela ezulwini, lithi: Enoke, ndodana yami, phrofetha kulabantu, uthi kubo—Phendukani, ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi: Ngibathukuthelele labantu, futhi intukuthelo yami enkulu yokhelekile ngokumelene nabo; ngokuba izinhliziyo zabo ziya ngokuba lukhuni, ne zindlebe zabo zibuthuntu ukuzwa, futhi amehlo abo awakwazi ukubona kude;

Futhi kulezi zizukulwane eziningi, kusukela ngosuku engabadala ngalo, badukile, futhi bangiphikile, futhi bafune ezabo izeluleko ebumnyameni; futhi kuzo izinengiso zabo benze amacebo okubulala, futhi abayigcinanga imiyalelo, engayinika uyise, u-Adamu.
Ngalokho-ke, bazifungele, futhi, nge zifungo zabo, bazilethele ukufa kubo; futhi isihogo ngisilungisele bona, uma bengaphenduki;

Futhi lona ngumyalelo, engawuthumela ekuqaleni komhlaba, usuka kowami umlomo, kusuka esisekelweni sawo, futhi nangemilomo yezinceku zami, oyihlo, ngiyimisile, ngisho njengoba izothunyelwa emhlabeni, kuze kube sekupheleni kwawo.

Futhi ngesikathi u-Enoke esewazwile lamazwi, wakhothama phansi, phambi kweNkosi, futhi wakhuluma phambi kweNkosi ethi: Kungani ukuba ngithole ukuthandwa emehlweni akho, futhi ngise ngumfana, futhi bonke abantu bayangizonda; ngokuba nginamalimi; ngalokho-ke ngabe ngiyinceku yakho na?

Futhi iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Hamba futhi wenze njengoba ngikuyalile, futhi akukho muntu oyokuhlaba. Vula umlomo wakho, futhi uyogcwaliswa, futhi ngiyokunika ozokusho, ngokuba yonke inyama isezandleni zami, futhi ngizokwenza njengoba kubonakala kukuhle kimi.
Yithi kulaba bantu: Khethani namuhla, ukuba nisebenzele iNkosi uNkulunkulu eyanenzayo.

Bheka uMoya wami ukuwe, ngalokho-ke wonke amazwi akho ngizobonisa ukuthi alungile; futhi izintaba ziyokubalekela, nemifula iyoshintsha imizila yayo; futhi uyohlala kimi, nami kuwe; ngakho-ke hamba nami.
Futhi iNkosi yakhuluma ku-Enoke, yathi kuye: Gcoba amehlo akho ngobumba, bese uyawageza, futhi uzobona. Futhi wenzenjalo.

Futhi wabona imimoya eyayi dalwe nguNkulunkulu; waphinde wabona nezinto ezazingabonakali ngamehlo enyama; futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi kwanda isisho ndawo zonke ezweni esasithi: Umboni iNkosi ibavusele abantu bayo.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wahamba kulelizwe, phakathi kwabantu, wema phezu kwamagquma nezindawo ezaziphakemeyo, futhi wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, efakaza ngokumelene nemisebenzi yabo; futhi bonke abantu bacasuka ngenxa yakhe.

Futhi beza ukuzomlalela, ezindaweni eziphakemeyo, bethi kubagcinimatende: Salani lapha futhi nigcine amatende, ngesikhathi sisaya ngale ukuyobona umboni, ngokuba uyaphrofetha, futhi kukhona okungajwayelekile kulelizwe; umuntu ohlanyayo uze phakathi kwethu.
Futhi kwenzeka ngesikhathi bemuzwa, akukho muntu owambeka isandla; ngokuba ukwesaba kwaba kubo bonke abamuzwayo; ngokuba wayehamba noNkulunkulu.
Futhi kweza umuntu kuye, igama lakhe okwakungu Mahijaha, futhi wathi kuye: Sitshele ngokucacile ungubani, futhi ngabe uphumaphi na?
Futhi wathi kubo: Ngiphuma ezweni laseKhenani, izwe lobaba, izwe lokulunga kuze kube manje. Futhi ubaba wangifundisa ngazo zonke izindlela zikaNkulunkulu.

Futhi kwenzeka, ngesikhathi ngisahamba ezweni laseKhenani, ngasephumalanga yolwandle, ngabona umbono; futhi bheka, ngabona amazulu, neNkosi yakhuluma nami, futhi yanginika imiyalelo, ngalokho-ke, ukuze ngigcine lemiyalelo, ngikhuluna lamazwi.

Futhi u-Enoke wayiqhuba inkulumo ethi: INkosi eyakhuluma nami, yiyo futhi enguNkulunkulu wasezulwini, futhi inguNkulunkulu wami, noNkulunkulu wenu, futhi nina ningabafowethu, futhi kungani nifuna ezenu izeluleko, futhi nimphika uNkulunkulu wasezulwini na?
Amazulu wawenza; umhlaba uyi senabelo sezinyawo zakhe; futhi isisekelo sawo singesakhe. Bhekani, wasimisa, isixuku sabantu wasiletha ebusweni bawo.
Futhi ukufa kweza kobaba bethu; nokho siyabazi, futhi ngeke sibaphike, futhi ngisho owokuqala kunabo bonke esimaziyo, ngisho u-Adamu.
Ngokuba incwadi yokukhumbula siyibhalile phakathi kwethu, ngokwendlela esiyinikwe ngomunwe kaNkulunkulu; futhi inikwe ngolimi lwethu.
Futhi ngesikhathi u-Enoke ekhuluma amazwi kaNkulunkulu, abantu bathuthumela, futhi abakwazanga ukuma phambi bakhe.
Futhi wathi kubo: Ngenxa yokuthi u-Adamu wawa, sikhona; futhi ngokuwa kwakhe kweza ukufa; futhi senziwa abahlanganyeli bokuhlupheka nosizi.

Bheka uSathane uze phakathi kwabantwana babantu, futhi ubalinge ukuba bakhonze yena; futhi abantu sebebe ngaba naka inyama, naba thokozisa imizwa, nabanobudeveli futhi ba susiwe phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa uNkulunkulu wayekwazisile kobaba bethu ukuthi bonke abantu kufanele baphenduke.
Futhi wabiza ubaba u-Adamu ngezwi lakhe, ethi: NginguNkulunkulu; ngenza umhlaba, na bantu ngaphambi kokuba babe senyameni.

Futhi wathi kuye: Uma ungaphendukela kimi, futhi ulalele izwi lami, futhi ukholwe, futhi uphenduke kuzo zonke iziphambeko zakho, futhi ubhabhadiswe, ngisho emanzini, egameni leNdodana yami eZelwe Yodwa, egcwele umusa neqiniso, engu Jesu Kristu, okuyilona gama kuphela elinikiwe ngaphansi kwezulu, insindiso eyokuza ngalo kubantwana babantu, uyofumana isipho sikaMoya oNgcwele, ucela zonke izinto egameni lakhe, futhi noma yini oyoyicela, uyonikwa yona.

Futhi ubaba u-Adamu wakhuluma neNkosi, futhi wathi: Kungani ukuba abantu kufanele baphenduke futhi babhabhadiswe emanzini na? Futhi iNkosi yathi ku-Adamu: Bheka ngikuxolele isiphambeko sakho eNsimini yase-Edene.

Kulokhu kwanda isisho ndawo zonke phakathi kwabantu, ukuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu isi hlawulele isono sokuqala, lapho izono zabazali zingeke zaphendulwa emakhanda abantwana, ngokuba bamsulwa kusuka ekusekelweni komhlaba.

Futhi iNkosi yakhuluma ku-Adamu, ithi: Kangangoba abantwana bakho bezalelwe esonweni, kanjalo-ke uma sebeqala ukukhula, isono siqala ukuba khona ezinhliziyweni zabo, futhi bezwa ubuhlungu, ukuze bakwazi ukwazisa okuhle.
Futhi kunikiwe kubo ukwazi okuhle nokubi; ngalokho-ke bayakwazi ukuzikhethela, futhi ngikunike omunye umthetho nemiyalelo.

Ngalokho-ke kufundise ebantwaneni bakho, ukuthi bonke abantu, yonke indawo, kufanele ba phenduke, noma kungenjalo ngeke bafumane ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba akukho okungcolileyo okungahlala lapho, noma okunga hlala lapho ekhona; okungukuthi, ngolimu luka-Adamu, iNdoda yobuNgcwele yigama lakhe, futhi igama loZelwe Yedwa wakhe yi Ndodana yoMuntu, ngisho uJesu Kristu, ongu Mahluleli olungileyo, oyoza maphakathi nesikhathi.
Ngakho-ke ngikunika umyalelo, ukuba uzifundise lezi zinto ngokukhululekileyo kubo abantwana bakho, uthi:

Ngenxa yesiphambeko kweza ukuwa, lokho kuwa okwaletha ukufa, futhi kangangoba wazalwa emhlabeni ngamanzi, negazi, no moya, engikwenzileyo, ngaleyo ndlela waba ngumuntu ophilayo usuka othulini, kanjalo-ke kufanele uzalwe kabusha embusweni wasezulwini, nga manzi, nangoMoya, futhi uhlanzwe ngegazi, ngisho ngegazi loZelwe Yedwa wami; ukuze ungcweliswe ezonweni zonke, futhi uthokozele amazwi okuphila okuphakade kulomhlaba, nokuphila okuphakade emhlabeni ozayo, ngisho inkazimulo yesimo sokungafi;
Ngokuba nga manzi ugcina imiyalelo; ngoMoya awunacala, futhi nge gazi uya ngcweliswa;

Ngakho-ke kunikiwe ukuba kuhlale kini; ubufakazi basezulwini; uMduduzi; izinto zokuthula zenkazimulo yesimo sokungafi; iqiniso lazo zonke izinto; lokho okuphilisa zonke izinto, okwenza kuphile zonke izinto; lokho okwazi zonke izinto, nokunawo wonke amandla ngokuhlakanipha, ngomusa, ngeqiniso, ngokulunga, nangokwahlulela.
Manje, bheka, ngithi kuwe: Leli yisu lensindiso kubantu bonke, ngegazi lo Zelwe Yedwa wami, oyoza maphakathi nesikhathi.

Futhi bheka, zonke izinto zinesifaniso sazo, futhi zonke izinto zadalwa futhi zenziwa ukuba zifakaze ngami, izinto ezingezemvelo, nezinto zomoya; izinto ezisezulwini phezulu, nezinto ezisemhlabeni, nezinto eziphakathi emhlabeni, nezinto ezingaphansi komhlaba, phezulu nangaphansi: zonke izinto zifakaza ngami.

Futhi kwenzeka, ngesikhathi iNkosi isikhulumile no-Adamu, ubaba, ukuthi u-Adamu wakhala eNkosini, futhi wahlwithwa ngu Moya weNkosi, futhi wayiswa phansi emanzini, futhi wacwiliswa kuwo amanzi, futhi wakhishwa emanzini.
Futhi ngaleyondlela wabhabhadiswa, futhi uMoya kaNkulunkulu wehlela kuye, futhi ngaleyondlela wazalwa ngoMoya, futhi waphiliswa ngaphakathi.
Futhi wezwa izwi livela ezulwini, lithi: Usu bhabhadisiwe ngomlilo, nangoMoya oNgcwele. Lobu wu bufakazi bukaBaba, neNdodana, kusukela manje naphakade;
Futhi ungoko hlelo lwakhe owayengenasiqalo sezinsuku noma isiphelo seminyaka, kusuka kulo lonke iphakade kuya kulo lonke iphakade.
Bheka, umunye nami, indodana kaNkulunkulu; futhi ngalendlela bonke bangaba nga madodana ami. Amen.

/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/7.title: Mose 7
chapter_summary: U-Enoke uyafundisa, uhola abantu, futhi ususa izintaba—Idolobha laseSiyoni liyamiswa—U-Enoke ubona ukuza kweNdodana yoMuntu, umnikelo Wayo ohlawulayo, novuko lwabaNgcwele—Ubona ukuBuyiselwa, ukuQoqwa, ukuZa kweSibili, nokubuya kweSiyoni.
subtitle: (Disemba 1830)

verses.text: Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wayiqhuba inkulumo yakhe, ethi: Bhekani, ubaba u-Adamu wazifundisa lezi zinto, futhi abaningi bakholwa futhi baba nga madodana kaNkulunkulu, futhi abaningi abakholwanga, futhi bafa besezonweni zabo, futhi babheke phambili ngo kwesaba, besebuhlungwini, belindele intukuthelo eshisayo yolaka lukaNkulunkulu ukuba ithelwe kubo.

Futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi u-Enoke waqala ukuphrofetha, ethi kubantu: Ngesikhathi ngisahamba, futhi ngime endaweni iMahuja, futhi ngikhala eNkosini, kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi—Jika, wenyukele entabeni iSimeyoni.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi ngajika futhi ngenyukela kuleyontaba; futhi ngesikhathi ngisame kuleyontaba, ngabona amazulu evuleka, futhi ngembathiswa ngenkazimulo;

Futhi ngabona iNkosi; futhi yayime phambi kobuso bami, futhi yakhuluma nami, ngisho njengomuntu ekhuluma nomunye, ubuso nobuso; futhi yathi kimi: Buka, ngizokutshengisa umhlaba isikhathi sezizukulwane eziningi.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi ngabona esigodini saseShum, futhi bheka, abantu abaningi ababehlala ematendeni, okwakungabantu baseShum.
Futhi phezu kwalokho iNkosi yathi kimi: Buka; futhi ngabuka ngasenyakatho, futhi ngabona abantu baseKhanana, ababehlala ematendeni.

Futhi iNkosi yathi kimi: Phrofetha; futhi ngaphrofetha, ngathi: Bheka abantu baseKhanana, abaningi, bazoya empini behlelelwe ukulwa nabantu baseShum, futhi bayobabulala kangangoba bayobabhubhisa baphele nya; futhi abantu baseKhanani bayozihlukanisa kulelizwe, futhi lelizwe ngeke libe nalutho futhi ngeke liveze lutho, futhi akusophinde kuhlale abanye abantu lapho ngaphandle kwabantu baseKhanana;

Ngokuba bhekani, iNkosi iyoqalekisa lelizwe ngokushisa okukhulu, futhi ukungabi nalutho kwalo kuyoqhubeka phakade; futhi kwabakhona ubumnyanma obeza kubantwana baseKhanana, ngangangoba badeleleka phakathi kwabo bonke abantu.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi iNkosi yathi kimi: Buka; futhi ngabuka, futhi ngabona izwe laseSharona, nezwe lika-Enoke, nezwe lase-Omineri, nezwe laseHeni, nezwe laseShemi, nezwe laseHena, futhi nezwe laseHananniha, nabo bonke abantu bakhona;
Futhi iNkosi yathi kimi: Hamba uye kulabantu, uthi kubo—Phendukani, funa ngiphume futhi ngibashaye ngesiqalekiso, futhi bafe.
Futhi wanginika umyalelo wokuthi kufanele ngi bhabhadise egameni likaBaba, neleNdodana, egcwele umusa neqiniso, nelika Moya oNgcwele, ofakaza ngoBaba nangeNdodana.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke waqhubeka nokubiza bonke abantu, ngaphandle kwabantu baseKhanani, ukuba baphenduke;

Lwalu lukhulu ukholo luka-Enoke kangangoba wabahola abantu baNkulunkulu, futhi izitha zabo zeza ukuzolwa nabo; wakhuluma izwi leNkosi, futhi umhlaba wazamazama, ne zintaba zabaleka, ngisho ngokomyalo wakhe; ne mifula yamanzi yakhishwa endleleni yayo; futhi nokubhonga kwamabhubesi kwezwakala kuphuma ehlane; futhi zonke izizwe zesaba kakhulu, lali namandla kakhulu izwi lika-Enoke, futhi ayemakhulu kakhulu amandla olimi uNkulunkulu ayemnike lona.
Kwavela izwe futhi phansi ekujuleni kolwandle, futhi kwaba kukhulu ukwesaba kwezitha zabantu baNkulunkulu, kangangoba babaleka bama kude futhi bahamba phezu kwalelozwe elaliphuma ekujuleni kolwandle.
Futhi imidondoshiya yalelozwe, nayo, yamela duke; futhi bonke abantu abalwa noNkulunkulu baqalekiswa;
Futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi kwaba nezimpi nokuchitheka kwegazi phakathi kwabo; kodwa iNkosi yeza yazohlala nabantu bayo, futhi bahlala ngokulunga.

Ukwesaba iNkosi kwaba kuzo zonke izizwe, yayinkulu ngaleyondlela inkazimulo yeNkosi, eyayi kubantu bayo. Futhi iNkosi yali busisa lelozwe, futhi babusiswa phezu kwezintaba, naphezu kwezindawo eziphezulu, futhi baphumelela.
Futhi iNkosi yabiza abantu bayo nge Siyoni, ngokuba babe nhliziyonye futhi bemqondomunye, futhi babehlala ngokulunga; futhi kwakungekho ompofu phakathi kwabo.
Futhi u-Enoke waqhubeka nokushumayela kwakhe ngokulunga kubantu baNkulunkulu. Futhi kwenzeka ngezinsuku zakhe, ukuthi wakha idolobha elalibizwa ngokuthi yiDolobha lobuNgcwele, ngisho iSiyoni.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wakhuluma neNkosi; futhi wathi eNkosini: Impela iSiyoni iyohlala ngokuphepha phakade. Kodwa iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: iSiyoni ngiyibusisile, kodwa insali yabantu ngiyiqalekisile.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi iNkosi yatshengisa u-Enoke bonke abantu basemhlabeni; futhi wabona, futhi bheka, iSiyoni, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, yathathwa yayiswa ezulwini. Futhi iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Bheka lapho ngihlala khona phakade.

Futhi u-Enoke waphinde wabona insali yabantu okwakungamadodana ka-Adamu; futhi ayeyinhlanganisela yayo yonke inzalo ka-Adamu ngaphandle kwenzalo kaKayini, ngokuba inzalo kaKayini yayi mnyama, futhi yayingenandawo phakathi kwabo.
Futhi emva kokuba iSiyoni isithathwe yayiswa ezulwini, u-Enoke wabona, futhi bheka, zonke izizwe zomhlaba zase ziphambi kwakhe;

Futhi kwadlula izizukulwane ngezizukulwane; futhi u-Enoke wayesephezulu futhi ese phakanyisiwe, ngisho esese sifubeni sikaBaba, nakweseNdodana yoMuntu; futhi bheka, amandla kaSathane ayesephezu kwabo bonke ubuso bomhlaba.
Futhi wabona izingelosi zehla ziphuma ezulwini; futhi wezwa izwi elikhulu lithi: Maye, maye kubantu basemhlabeni.
Futhi wabona uSathane; futhi wayene ketango elikhulu esandleni sakhe, futhi laligubuzele bonke ubuso bomhlaba ngo bumnyama; futhi wabheka phezulu futhi wahleka, ne zingelosi zakhe zajabula.
Futhi u-Enoke wabona izingelosi zehla ziphuma ezulwini, zifakaza ngoBaba neNdodana; uMoya oNgcwele wehlela kwabaningi, futhi bahlwithwa ngamandla asezulwini bayiswa eSiyoni.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uNkulunkulu wasezulwini wabuka insali yabantu, futhi wakhala; futhi u-Enoke wafakaza ngalokho, ethi: Kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi amazulu akhale, futhi achithe izinyembezi zawo njengemvula phezu kwezintaba na?
Futhi u-Enoke wathi eNkosini: Kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi unga khala, ngokuba ungcwele, futhi uvela kulo lonke iphakade kuya kulo lonke iphakade na?

Futhi ukuba kwakungenzeka ukuthi umuntu abale izinxenye zonke zomhlaba, yebo, izigidi zemihlaba ezinjengalona, ngeke kube yisiqalo sobungako be ndalo yakho; futhi amakhethini akho aseluliwe namanje; futhi nakuba kunjalo uselapho, futhi nesifuba sakho siselapho; futhi ulungile, futhi unomhawu nomusa ingunaphakade;

Futhi uyithathile iSiyoni wayisa esifubeni sakho, wayehlukanisa nayo yonke indalo yakho, kusuka kulo lonke iphakade kuya kulo lonke iphakade, futhi akukho lutho ngaphandle ko kuthula, ukulunga, futhi ne qiniso lapho kuhlala khona isihlalo sakho sobukhosi; futhi umusa uyohamba phambi kobuso bakho futhi ungabi nasiphetho; kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi ungakhala na?

INkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Bheka laba abafowenu; bangumsebenzi we zandla zami uqobo, futhi ngibanike ulwazi lwabo, ngosuku engabadala ngalo; futhi eNsimini yase-Edene, ngamnika umuntu ilungelo lakhe lokuzikhethela;
Futhi kubafowenu ngithe, futhi ngabanika umyalelo, wokuthi maba thandane, nokuthi bakhethe mina, uYise; kodwa bheka, abanalo uthando, futhi bazonda igazi labo uqobo;
Futhi umlilo wolaka lwami wokhelekile ngokumelene nabo; futhi ekungajabulini kwami okushisayo ngizothumela izikhukhula phezu kwabo, ngokuba intukuthelo yami enkulu yokhelekile ngokumelene nabo.
Bheka, nginguNkulunkulu; iNdoda yobuNgcwele yigama lami; iNdoda yokuHlakanipha okuPheleleyo yigama lami; futhi ongaPheliyo nongunaPhakade yi gama lami, futhi.

Ngalokho-ke, ngingazelula izandla zami futhi ngiyibambe yonke indalo engiyenzileyo; phezu kwalokho iso lami lingayibuka ngokujulileyo, futhi phakathi kwayo yonke imisebenzi yezandla zami akukaze kube khona ububi obungaka njengalobu obuphakathi kwabafowenu.

Kodwa bheka, izono zabo ziyoba phezu kwamakhanda oyise; uSathane uyoba nguyise, futhi usizi luyoba yisiphetho sabo; futhi amazulu wonke ayobakhalela, ngisho wonke umsebenzi wezandla zami; ngalokho-ke akufanele yini amazulu akhale, ngokubona ukuthi laba bazozwa buhlungu na?
Kodwa bheka, laba amehlo akho ababukayo bayobhubha ngezikhukhula; futhi bheka, ngizobavalela, ngibalungisele itilongo.

Futhi lowo engimkhethileyo ukhalile phambi kobuso bami. Ngalokho-ke, wezwa ubuhlungu ngenxa yezono zabo; kangangoba beyophenduka ngosuku lapho oKhethiweyo wami eyobuyela kimi, futhi kuze kube yilolo suku bayoba se buhlungwini obukhulu;
Ngalokho-ke, ngenxa yalokho amazulu ayokhala, yebo, nawo wonke umsebenzi wezandla zami.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi iNkosi yakhuluma ku-Enoke, futhi yamtshela u-Enoke zonke izenzo zabantwana babantu; ngalokho-ke u-Enoke wazi, futhi wabubuka ububi babo, nosizi lwabo, futhi wakhala futhi welula izingalo zakhe, futhi inhliziyo yakhe yavuvukala yaba banzi njengephakade; nezibilini zakhe zagcwala isihawu; futhi lonke iphakade lathuthumela.
Futhi u-Enoke futhi wambona uNowa, nomdeni wakhe; ukuthi isizukulwane samadodana onke kaNowa kwakufanele sisindiswe ngensindiso yesikhashana;
Ngalokho-ke u-Enoke wabona ukuthi uNowa wakha umkhumbi; futhi iNkosi yakuthokozela lokho, futhi yawuvikela ngesandla sayo uqobo; kodwa phezu kwensali yababi izikhukhula zeza futhi zabagwinya.

Futhi ngesikhathi u-Enoke ekubona lokhu, waba nomunyu womphefumulo, futhi wabakhalela abafowabo, futhi wathi emazulwini: Ngizokwenqaba ukududuzeka; kodwa iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Phakamisa inhliziyo yakho, futhi ujabule; futhi buka.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wabuka; futhi kusuka kuNowa, wabona yonke imindeni yomhlaba; futhi wakhala eNkosini, ethi: Ngabe luyofika nini usuku lweNkosi na? Ngabe igazi loLungileyo liyochithwa nini, ukuze bonke abalilayo ba ngcweliswe futhi bazuze ukuphila okuphakade na?
Futhi iNkosi yathi: Kuyoba maphakathi nesikhathi, ezinsukwini zobubi nempindiselo.

Futhi bheka, u-Enoke walubona usuku lokuza kweNdodana yoMuntu, ngisho enyameni; nomphefumulo wakhe wajabula, uthi: oLungileyo uphakanyisiwe, futhi iMvana ibulewe kusuka ekuselweni komhlaba; futhi ngokholo ngisesifubeni sikaBaba; futhi bheka, iSiyoni inami.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wawubuka umhlaba; futhi wezwa izwi lisuka ezibilini zawo lithi; Maye, maye kimi, unina wabantu; ngizwa ubuhlungu, ngikhathele, ngenxa yobubi babantwana bami. Ngiyo phumula nini, futhi ngihlanzwe kukho ukungcola osekuphume kimi na? UmDali wami uzongingcwelisa nini, ukuze ngiphumule, nokulunga kuhlale isikhashana ebusweni bami na?
Ngesikhathi u-Enoke ezwa umhlaba ulila, wakhala, futhi wanxusa eNkosini, ethi: O Nkosi, ubungeke uwuzwele umhlaba na? Ubunge babusise abantwana baNowa na?

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke waqhubeka nokunxusa eNkosini, ethi: Ngiyakucela, O, Nkosi, egameni loZelwe Yedwa wakho, ngisho uJesu Kristu, ukuthi ube nomusa kuNowa nenzalo yakhe, ukuze umhlaba ungabe usambozwa yizikhukhula futhi.
Futhi iNkosi ayikwazanga ukuzibamba; futhi yavumelana no-Enoke, futhi yafunga kuye ngesifungo, ukuthi yayiyozivimba izikhukhula; ukuthi iyobanxusa abantwana baNowa;
Futhi wathumela isimemezelo esingaguquleki, ukuthi insali yenzalo yakhe kufanele njalo itholakale phakathi kwazo zonke izizwe, ngesikhathi umhlaba usamile;

Futhi iNkosi yathi: Ubusisiwe lowo uMesiya uyoza ngenzalo yakhe; ngokuba wathi—Ngingu Mesiya, iNkosi yaseSiyoni, iDwala laseZulwini, elibanzi njengephakade; lowo ongena ngesango futhi akhuphukele phezulu ngami akasoze awa; ngalokho-ke, babusisiwe labo esengikhulume ngabo, ngokuba bayoza nga maculo enjabulo yaphakade.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke wanxusa eNkosini, ethi: Ngesikhathi iNdodana yoMuntu isiza enyameni, ngabe umhlaba uyophumula na? Ngiyakucela, ngitshengise lezi zinto.
Futhi iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Buka, futhi wabuka futhi wabona iNdodana yoMuntu iphakanyiselwa kuso isiphambano, ngendlela yabantu;

Futhi wezwa izwi elikhulu; namazulu adabuka; nendalo yonke kaNkulunkulu yalila; nomhlaba wabubula; namadwala aqhekezeka; nabangcwele bavuka, futhi ba qheliswa kwesobunene seNdodana yoMuntu, ngemiqhele yenkazimulo;
Futhi ngobuningi be mimoya eyayise tilongweni yavuka, futhi yama kwesobunene sikaNkulunkulu; futhi insali yagcinwa emaketangweni obumnyama kwaze kwaba ukwahlulelwa kosuku olukhulu.
Futhi phezu kwalokho u-Enoke wakhala wanxusa eNkosini, ethi: Ngabe uyophumula nini umhlaba na?

Futhi u-Enoke wayibona iNdodana yoMuntu yenyukela kuBaba; futhi wacela eNkosini, ethi: Ubungeke yini uze futhi emhlabeni na? Ngokubona ukuthi unguNkulunkulu, futhi ngiyakwazi, futhi ufungile kimi, futhi wangiyala ukuba ngicele egameni loZelwe Yedwa wakho; ungenzile, futhi wanginika ilungelo lokuya esihlalweni sakho sobukhosi, futhi hhayi ngokwami, kodwa ngomusa wakho; ngalokho-ke ngiyakucela ukuthi ubungeke yini uze futhi emhlabeni.

Futhi iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Njengoba ngiphila, ngisho kanjalo-ke ngizoza nge zinsuku zokugcina, ngezinsuku zobubi nempindiselo, ukuzogcwalisa isifungo engisenzileyo kuwe ngokuphathelene nabantwana baNowa;

Futhi usuku luyeza lapho umhlaba uyo phumula khona, kodwa ngaphambi kwalolo suku amazulu ayo gqunqiswa, isisitho sobumnyama siyowumboza umhlaba; namazulu ayozamazama, ngokunjalo nomhlaba; futhi izinkathazo ezinkulu ziyoba phakathi kwabantwana babantu, kodwa abantu bami ngiyobagcina;

Futhi ukulunga ngizokuthumela phansi kusuka ezulwini; futhi iqiniso ngizolithumela lisuka phakathi emhlabeni, ukuze lifakaze ngoZelwe Yedwa wami; ukuvuka kwakhe kwabafileyo; yebo, futhi novuko lwabo bonke abantu; futhi ukulunga neqiniso ngiyokwenza kushanele umhlaba njengesikhukhula, ukuze kuqoqe abakhethiweyo bami kuwo womane amagumbi omhlaba, endaweni engiyoyilungisa, iDolobha eliNgcwele, ukuze abantu bami babophe izinkalo zabo, futhi ukuba balindele isikhathi sokuza kwami; ngokuba liyoba lapho itabernakele lami, futhi liyobizwa ngeSiyoni, iJerusalema eNtsha.

Futhi iNkosi yathi ku-Enoke: Ngaleso sikhathi wena nalo lonke idolobha lakho niyohlangana nabo khona, futhi siyobemukela ezifubeni zethu, futhi bayosibona; futhi siyobasingatha, futhi nabo bayosisingatha, futhi siyokwangana;
Futhi lapho kuyoba yindawo yami engihlala kuyo, futhi kuyoba iSiyoni, eyovela kuyo yonke indalo engiyenzileyo; futhi esikhathini se minyaka eyinkulungwane umhlaba uyo phumula.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi u-Enoke walubona usuku lokuza kweNdodana yoMuntu, ezinsukwini zokugcina, izohlala emhlabeni ngokulunga isikhathi senkulungwane yeminyaka;

Kodwa ngaphambi kwalolo suku wabona izinkathazo ezinkulu phakathi kwababi; futhi walubona ulwandle, ukuthi lwalunolaka, nezinhliziyo zabantu ziphela amandla, bebheke ngokwesaba ukwahlulela kukaMninimandla Onke uNkulunkulu, okufanele kuze kwababi.
Futhi iNkosi yamtshengisa u-Enoke zonke izinto, ngisho kwaze kwaba sekupheleni komhlaba; futhi walubona nosuku lwabalungileyo, ihora lokuhlengwa kwabo, futhi bazuza injabulo ephelele;
Futhi zonke izinsuku zeSiyoni, ngezinsuku zika-Enoke, zazingamakhulu amathathu namashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu eminyaka.

Futhi u-Enoke nabo bonke abantu bakhe babehamba noNkulunkulu, futhi wayehlala phakathi kweSiyoni; futhi kwenzeka ukuthi iSiyoni yayingasekho, ngokuba uNkulunkulu wayemukela esifubeni sakhe uqobo; futhi kusuka ngaleso sikhathi kwanda isisho esithi: iSiyoni yemuka.

chapter_summary: UMetushela uyaphrofetha—UNowa namadodana akhe bashumayela ivangeli—Ububi buyabusa—Isicelo sokuphenduka asinakwa—UNkulunkulu umemezela ukufa kwayo yonke inyama ngesiKhukhula.
subtitle: (Februwari 1831)

verses.text: Futhi zonke izinsuku zika-Enoke zazingamakhulu amane namashumi amathathu eminyaka.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMetushela, indodana ka-Enoke, akathathwanga, ukuze izivumelwano zeNkosi zigcwaliseke, azenza ku-Enoke; ngokuba ngempela wavumelana no-Enoke ukuthi uNowa kufanele abe yinzalo yokhalo lwakhe.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMetushela waphrofetha ukuthi okhalweni lwakhe kufanele kuphume yonke imibuso yomhlaba (ngoNowa), futhi waziphakamisa.
Futhi kwabakhona indlala enkulu ezweni, futhi iNkosi yaliqalekisa lelozwe ngesiqalekiso esinzima, futhi abaningi bantu bakhona bafa.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uMetushela waphila iminyaka eyikhulu namashumi ayisishiyagalombili nesikhombisa, futhi wazala uLameka;
Futhi uMetushela waphila, emuva kokuzala uLameka, iminyaka engamakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisishiyagalombili nambili, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi;
Futhi zonke izinsuku zikaMetushela zaba yiminyaka engamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye namashumi ayisithupha nesishiyagalolunye, futhi wayesefa.
Futhi uLameka waphila iminyaka iyikhulu namashumi ayisishiyagalombili nambili, futhi wazala indodana,
Futhi wayetha igama lokuthi uNowa, ethi: Lendodana izosiduduza ngokuphathelene nomsebenzi wethu nokusebenza kwezandla zethu, ngenxa yomhlabathi iNkosi ewuqalekisile.
Futhi uLameka waphila, emuva kokuzala uNowa, iminyaka engamakhulu amahlanu namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nanhlanu, futhi wazala amadodana namadodakazi;
Futhi zonke izinsuku zikaLameka zaba yiminyaka engamakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisikhombisa nesikhombisa, futhi wayesefa.

Futhi uNowa wayeneminyaka yobudala engamakhulu amane namashumi amahlanu, futhi wazala uJafete; kwathi emva kweminyaka engamashumi amane nambili wazala uShemi kuye owayengunina kaJafete, futhi kwathi eseneminyaka engamakhulu amahlanu ubudala wazala uHamu.
Futhi uNowa namadodana akhe bayilalela iNkosi, futhi bayinaka, futhi babizwa nga madodana kaNkulunkulu.

Futhi kwathi lapho lamadoda eseqala ukwanda ebusweni bomhlaba, futhi esezala amadodakazi, amadodana abantu abona ukuthi lawo madodakazi ayemahle, futhi bawenza abafazi babo, ngisho njengokukhetha kwabo.
Futhi iNkosi yathi kuNowa: Amadodakazi amadodana akho azidayisile; ngokuba bheka ulaka lwani lokhelekile ngokumelene namadodana abantu, ngokuba bayenqaba ukulalela izwi lami.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uNowa waphrofetha, futhi wafundisa ngezinto zikaNkulunkulu, ngisho njengoba zazinjalo ekuqaleni.

Futhi iNkosi yathi kuNowa: UMoya wami awuyiku sebenza njalo kumuntu, ngokuba uyokwazi ukuthi yonke inyama iyokufa; kepha izinsuku zakhe ziyoba iminyaka elikhulu namashumi amabili; futhi uma abantu bengaphenduki, ngizothumela izikhukhula kubo.
Futhi ngalezo zinsuku kwakukhona imidondoshiya emhlabeni, futhi yayimfuna uNowa ukuba imbulale; kodwa iNkosi yayinoNowa, futhi amandla eNkosi ayephezu kwakhe.
Futhi iNkosi yam gcoba uNowa ngo hlelo lwakhe uqobo, futhi yamyala ukuthi kufanele ahambe amemezele iVangeli layo kubantwana babantu, ngisho njengoba kwakunikiwe ku-Enoke.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uNowa wababiza abantwana babantu ukuba ba phenduke; kodwa abawalalelanga amazwi akhe;

Futhi phezu kwalokho, emuva kokuba sebemzwile, bakhuphukela kuye, bethi: Bheka, singamadodana kaNkulunkulu; asiwathathanga yini amadodakazi abantu aba ngabafazi bethu na? Futhi ngabe asidli futhi siphuze, siganwe futhi sendisa na? Futhi abafazi bethu basizalela abantwana, futhi nabo bangamadoda anamandla, anjengamadoda asendulo, amadoda odumo olukhulu. Futhi abawalalelanga amazwi kaNowa.
Futhi uNkulunkulu wabona ukuthi ububi babantu base bubu khulu emhlabeni; futhi wonke umuntu wayeziphakamisile ngokwe midlinzo yenhliziyo yakhe, imibi njalo.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi uNowa waqhubeka noku shumayela kwakhe kubantu, ethi: Lalelani, futhi wanakeni amazwi ami;

Kholwani futhi niphenduke ezonweni zenu futhi nibhabhadiswe egameni likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ngisho njengobaba bethu, futhi niyofumana uMoya oNgcwele, ukuze nambulelwe zonke izinto; futhi uma ningakwenzi lokhu, izikhukhula zizoza kini; nokho abalalelanga.
Futhi wazisola uNowa, futhi inhliziyo yakhe yaba buhlungu ukuthi iNkosi yenze abantu emhlabeni, futhi kwamhlupha enhliziyweni.

Futhi iNkosi yathi: Ngizoba bhubhisa abantu engibadalile, ebusweni bomhlaba, abantu nezilwane, futhi nokunwabuzelayo, nezinyoni emkhathini; ngokuba uzisolile uNowa ukuthi ngibadalile, futhi nokuthi ngibenzile; futhi ungibizile; ngokuba bafune impilo yakhe.

Futhi ngaleyondlela uNowa wathola umusa emehlweni eNkosi; ngokuba uNowa wayengumuntu olungileyo, futhi ephelele du esizukulwaneni sakhe; futhi wayehamba noNkulunkulu, njengoba kwenza namadodana akhe amathathu, uShemi, uHamu, kanye noJafete.
Umhlaba wase wonakele phambi kukaNkulunkulu, futhi wawusugcwele udlame.
Futhi uNkulunkulu wawubuka umhlaba, futhi, bheka, wase wonakele, ngokuba konke okuphilayo kwase kunezenzo ezimbi emhlabeni.
Futhi uNkulunkulu wathi kuNowa: Isiphetho sayo yonke inyama sesifikile phambi kwami, ngokuba umhlaba usugcwele udlame, futhi bheka ngizoyibhubhisa yonke inyama isuke emhlabeni.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/1.title: Abrahama 1
chapter_summary: U-Abrahama ufuna ukuthola izibusiso zohlelo lobuphatriyakhi—Uhlushwa ngabaphristi bamanga eKalediya—UJehova uyamhlenga—Umdabuko nokubuswa kweGibithe kuyachazwa.
subtitle: IHunyushwe kuSuka kokusaPhepha, nguJoseph Smith

verses.text: Ezweni la maKaledi, ekhaya lobaba, mina, u-Abrahama, ngabona ukuthi kwakudingekile ukuba ngithole enye indawo yoku hlala;

Futhi, ngithola ukuthi kwakunoku thokoza okukhulu no kuthula kimi, ngafuna izibusiso zobaba, nelungelo lokuba ngigcotshwe ukuze ngiphathe lezo zibusiso; kade nami uqobo ngingumlandeli wo kulunga, ngifisa futhi ukuba ngomunye ono lwazi olukhulu, nokuba ngumlandeli wokulunga othembekileyo, futhi nokuba ngibe nolwazi oluningana, futhi nokuba ngibe ngubaba wezizwe eziningi, inkosi yokuthula, futhi ngifisa ukuthola iziyalo, nokuba ngigcine imiyalelo kaNkulunkulu, ngaba yindlalifa ngokusemthethweni, uMphristi omKhulu, ngiphethe ilungelo elingelobaba.

La nikwa kimi lisuka kobaba; lehla njalo lisuka kobaba, kusuka ekuqaleni kwesikhathi, yebo, ngisho kusuka ekuqaleni, noma ngaphambi kokusekelwa komhlaba, kwehla njalo kuze kube yisikhathi samanje, ngisho ilungelo le zibulo, noma indoda yokuqala, engu-Adamu, noma ubaba wokuqala, ngobaba kwehla njalo kuze kube kimi.
Ngafuna ukubekwa kwami kubo ubuPhristi ngendlela uNkulunkulu abeka ngayo obaba ngokuphathelene nenzalo.
Obaba bami, sebekushiyile ukulunga kwabo, nemiyalelo engcwele iNkosi uNkulunkulu wabo eyayibanike yona, bakhonza onkulunkulu babahedeni, benqaba impela ukulalela izwi lami;

Ngokuba izinhliziyo zabo zazigxile ekwenzeni ububi, futhi zase zigxile ngokuphelele ku nkulunkulu ka-Elkena, naku nkulunkulu kaLibna, naku nkulunkulu kaMamakra, naku nkulunkulu kaKorashi, naku nkulunkulu kaFaro, inkosi yaseGibithe;

Ngakho-ke izinhliziyo zabo zaphendukela kwiminikelo yabahedeni ekunikeleni abantwana babo kulezi zithixo ezingakhulumi, futhi bangalilalela izwi lami, kodwa bazama ukuthatha impilo yami ngesandla somphristi ka-Elkena. Umphristi ka-Elkena wayengumphristi kaFaro futhi.

Manje, ngalesi sikhathi kwakuwusiko lwabaphristi baFaro, inkosi yaseGibithe, ukunikela e-altare elalakhiwe ezweni laseKalediya, ukuze kunikelwe kulabonkulunkulu abangaziwa, amadoda, abesifazane, nabantwana.
Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi lomphristi wenza umnikelo kunkulunkulu kaFaro, nakunkulunkulu kaShagrili, ngisho ngendlela yabaseGibithe. Manje unkulunkulu kaShagrili kwakuyilanga.
Ngisho umnikelo wokubonga womntwana umphristi kaFaro wawunikela e-altare elalime ngasegqumeni elalibizwa ngokuthi yiGquma lika-Photifari, lapho kuqala khona ithafa lase-Olishemi.

Manje, lomphristi wayesenikele kuleli-altare izintombi ezimsulwa ezintathu ngesikhathi esisodwa, ezazingamadodakazi ka-Onitha, omunye wasebukhosini ophuma ngqo okhalweni luka Hamu. Lezi zintombi ezimsulwa zanikelwa ngenxa yokulunga kwazo; zazingeke zivume ukuguqa zikhonze onkulunkulu bokhuni noma betshe, ngakho-ke zabulawela phezu kwaleli-altare, futhi kwenziwa ngendlela yaseGibithe.

Futhi kwenzeka ukuthi abaphristi bangibamba ngendluzula, ukuze bangibulale nami futhi, njengoba benza kulezo zintombi ezimsulwa phezu kwaleli-altare; futhi ukuze ube nolwazi lwaleli-altare, ngizokuyalela emfanekisweni osekuqaleni kwalombhalo.

Lalakhiwe ngesimo sohlaka lombhede, njengalolo olwalukhona phakathi kwamaKaledi, futhi lalime phambi konkulunkulu ba-Elkena, baLibna, baMamakra, nabaKorashi, futhi nonkulunkulu ofana nokaFaro, inkosi yaseGibithe.
Ukuze ube nokuqonda ngalabo nkulunkulu, ngikunike umfanekiso wabo kulemidwebo ewekuqaleni, loluhlobo lwemidwebo lubizwa ngamaKaledi ngokuthi yiRahleenos, okusho ukuloba ngemifanekiso.

Futhi ngesikhathi bengibamba ngezandla zabo, ukuze banginikele futhi bathathe impilo yami, bheka, ngaphakamisela izwi lami eNkosini uNkulunkulu wami, futhi iNkosi yalalela futhi yezwa, futhi yangigcwalisa ngombono kaMninimandla Onke, futhi ingelosi esuka kuye yema eduze nami, futhi masinyane yazikhulula izibopho zami;

Futhi izwi lakhe lathi kimi: Abrahama, Abrahama, bheka, igama lami ngingu Jehova, futhi ngikuzwile, futhi ngehle ukuzoku khulula, nokuzokususa emzini kayihlo, nakuzo zonke izihlobo zakho, ngikuse kwelinye izwe ongalaziyo;

Futhi lokhu kungenxa yokuthi sebezisusile izinhliziyo zabo kimi, ukuze bakhonze unkulunkulu ka-Elkena, nonkulunkulu ka-Libna, nonkulunkulu kaMahmackra, nonkulunkulu kaKorashi, nonkulunkulu kaFaro, inkosi yaseGibithe, ngakho-ke ngehlele ukuba ngizobajezisa, futhi nokuba ngizombhubhisa lowo ophakamisela isandla kuwe, Abrahama, ndodana yami, ukuba akubulale.
Bheka, ngizokuhola ngesandla sami, futhi ngizokuthatha, ukuba ngibeke kuwe igama lami, ngisho ubuPhristi bukayihlo, futhi namandla ami ayoba phezu kwakho.
Njengoba kwakunjalo kuNowa kuyoba njalo nakuwe; kodwa ngobufundisi bakho igama lami liyokwaziwa emhlabeni phakade, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu wakho.

Bheka, iGquma likaPotifari lalisezweni lase-Uri, yaseKalediya. Futhi iNkosi yalidiliza i-altare lika-Elkena, nelonkulunkulu balelozwe, futhi yababhubhisa nya, futhi yamshaya umphristi kangangoba wafa; futhi kwaba nokulila okukhulu eKalediya, ngokunjalo nasemzini kaFaro; ukuthi Faro kusho ukuthi yinkosi ngokozalo lwasebukhosini.
Manje lenkosi yaseGibithe yayingeyozalo olusuka okhalweni luka Hamu, futhi yayinegazi la maKhanani ngokuzalwa.
Kusuka kuloluzalo kwadabuka wonke amaGibithe, futhi negazi lamaKhanani lagcinwa kanjalo-ke kulelizwe.
Izwe lase Gibithe lalitholwe kuqala ngowesimame, owayeyindodakazi kaHamu, futhi eyindodakazi kaGibithusi, ngesiKaledi okusho ukuthi iGibithe, okusho ukuthi lokho okwenqatshelwe;

Ngesikhathi lona owesimame ethola lelizwe lalingaphansi kwamanzi, okwathi emuva kwesikhathi wahlalisa amadodana akhe kulo; futhi ngaleyo ndlela, kusuka kuHamu, kwadabuka isizwe esagcina isiqalekiso kulelizwe.
Manje umkhandlu ophetheyo wokuqala waseGibithe wamiswa nguFaro, indodana endala kaGibithusi, indodakazi kaHamu, futhi wawungohlobo lomkhandlu ophetheyo kaHamu, lwalungubu phatriyakhi.

UFaro, eyindoda elungileyo, wamisa umbuso futhi wehlulela abantu bakhe ngobuhlakani nangokulunga izinsuku zakhe zonke, efuna ngenhliziyo yakhe ukulingisa lolohlelo olwamiswa ngobaba ezizukulwaneni zokuqala, ezinsukwini zombuso wokuqala wobuphatriyakhe, ngisho ekubuseni kuka-Adamu, futhi nokukaNowa, uyise, owambusisa nge zibusiso zomhlaba, nangezibusiso zokuhlakanipha, kodwa wamqalekisa ngokuphathelene nobuPhristi.
Manje, uFaro engowalolozalo ngalo wayengekwazi ukuba nelungelo lo buPhristi, nakuba oFaro babengafisa ukulifuna kusuka kuNowa, ngoHamu, ngakho-ke ubaba waholeleka ekukhonzeni kwabo izithixo;

Kodwa ngizozama, emuva kwalokhu, ukunikeza incazelo yokwenzeka kwezinto kuya emuva kusuka kimi kuya ekuqaleni kwendalo, ngokuba imibhalo isifikile ezandleni zami, engisayigcinile kuze kube yisikhathi samanje.

Manje, emuva kokuba lomphristi ka-Elkena eseshayiwe kangangoba wafa, kwabakhona ukugcwaliseka kwalezo zinto ezashiwo kimi ngokuphathelene nezwe laseKalediya, ukuthi kufanele kubekhona indlala kulelozwe.
Kanjalo-ke indlala yabusa kulo lonke izwe laseKalediya, futhi ubaba wahlukumezeka kabuhlungu ngenxa yendlala, futhi waphenduka ebubini ayekucebela mina, ukuthatha impilo yami.

Kodwa imibhalo yobaba, ngisho abaphatriyakhi, ngokuphathelene nelungelo lobuPhristi, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wami yayigcina ezandleni zami; ngakho-ke ulwazi lokuqala kwendalo, futhi nolwa maplanethi, futhi nolwezinkanyezi, njengoba kwaziswa kobaba, ngisalugcinile ngisho kuze kube yimanje, futhi ngizozama ukubhala ezinye zalezi zinto kulombhalo, ukuze kuzuze inzalo yami eyokuza emuva kwami.

/study/scriptures/pgp/abr/2.title: Abrahama 2
